story:
LAST REMAINING HOURS!!!

Stretch Goal #1 was funded in just a few hours after being posted!!!  Time for Stretch Goal#2!

If we reach $1500, I'll create a video with animated page-turning to accompany the fully-narrated audio-book of the first stretch goal, for an animated storybook. It will look just like the trailer for the book, and pick up where it left off for the complete story!  Everyone who has contributed to the campaign will receive this perk, so keep sharing the link!

Wow! Wow! Wow!  Fully funded?!?!  Thank you so much, everyone!  You are all amazing!

And as with any great success, we're not stopping there!  We're adding a stretch goal of $125 which will allow us to purchase the professional recording equipment needed to record Tonia's full narration for the book heard in the trailer video.  Upon reaching the stretch goal, everyone who has contributed to the campaign will receive a copy of the audio book as well!

First, I want to thank you for taking the time to visit the campaign.  For those of you who are new to my book and to me, my name is Jimmy Compton.  I'm the creator, author, and illustrator of this book.  I'm a geek who took an interest in comics and digital art from a young age.  I grew up in a Bay Area suburb in Northern California, and took an interest in computers shortly after they became widely available in the home. My sights quickly went to how computers could be used to create art. I combined this with my more 'traditional' art studies, and a monster was born.

The Secret Door is the story of a curious girl that fancies herself "Princess of the Realm", who one day discovers a secret door that leads to a dungeon she explores, and ends up having to escape a determined huntress.  The idea for this book was essentially to create an all-new fairy tale.  This goes beyond the same old retellings, modernizations, and parodies of old stories; not that there’s anything wrong with those.  Classics are classics for a reason, and that’s a large part of the reason for this book.  This is something new and different to enjoy, while still retaining the merit of those classic tales. It's an original work that makes use of familiar themes and takes place in traditional fantasy settings. It differs from other books because it’s not a retelling, but still takes advantage of the influential ideas and themes set forth in classic fairy tales, as well as countless other stories since.

Strict attention has been paid to the quality of the book, as well as much research to ensure that it brings something fresh to the table. This was done to create something new, fun, and different yet familiar, in hopes that it will appeal to younger and older readers alike.

For those of you who have been patiently (or not so patiently) ;) waiting a very long three years for the opportunity to receive the book in it’s physical form, thank you for waiting.  Thank you for still being passionate about this book! I was absolutely gutted when things didn’t work out the first time around with the Kickstarter campaign, because like so many of you, I truly believe in this book.  Unfortunately, back then, I just couldn’t figure out a way to self-publish properly without at least $5,000 backing the project.  I really wanted to make the story available, and it was just sitting here, so in an attempt to share the book any way I could, I forged ahead with creating the e-book version instead.(http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00YTAJ8GY)

Still, so many of you continued asking for a physical version, and I'm grateful you did because it pushed me to look into self-publishing again. Thankfully, the world of self-publishing is ever-changing, and the answer has eventually showed itself, and I've worked out a way to fully fund production of the book for about 20% of what it would have taken just a few years ago. ($1060 as opposed to $5000.) I just know we can make this happen!

Since the book is already 100% completed and ready for printing, the $1060 will go to cover ISBN purchase, set-up costs with the publishing company, listing fees, and the costs of printing and shipping the books.  

By donating $25 or more to my campaign, you are ensuring your copy(s) of the book.  Higher pledge levels are available for those of you who either want to purchase extra copies as gifts, or to donate to libraries, day care centers, church nurseries, etc.  Those who pledge for multiple books will also receive extra perks such as book marks, posters, and even the e-book!  But even if you do not want to purchase a copy for yourself, you may certainly make your donation and let us know where you want your copy(s) sent.  Shipping in the US is no additional charge.  We will be shipping world-wide for $20.

For those of you who are looking to show your support without purchasing the book, we have the $1 and $5 donations available.  Some people just can't contribute monetarily, and I completely understand.  That doesn't mean you can't help!  Of course, the most important way you can support the book is by sharing this campaign link via all of your social media accounts!  Getting the word out is vital.

'Sinceriously', all I want is to see this book printed and in the hands of those who can appreciate it, both young and young at heart. So tweet it, Instgram it, Facebook it, e-mail it, blog it, shout it from the rooftops, etc!  #TheSecretDoor (A lot of which can be accomplished with the sharing tools right here on Indiegogo.) If you do donate, please also share that you donated, and ask your friends and family if they might take a look at the campaign as well.

Now I know many of you originally expressed interest in giving the book as a gift for the holidays, and with December around the corner, that doesn’t leave much time. So if you are anxious to receive your copy(s) of the book in time for this year’s giving season, I urge you to make your pledge sooner rather than later.  The sooner the campaign is funded, the sooner I can place the order. Many of you specifically asked for your copies to be signed, and that requires the books be shipped to me before being shipped to you, which naturally adds extra processing time.

For those of you who would like your copy(s) of the book signed by me, please be sure to indicate that when you make your pledge.

Again, thank you so much for visiting, and for your support.  This is so going to happen!

 - Jimmy

story:
Now known as Connetic Word, the CT National Youth Poetry Slam Team began in 1998 when the Capitol Region Educational Council helped host the first-ever National High School Poetry Slam.  Teams came from NYC, Worcester, Washington DC, the Navajo Nation from New Mexico and of course, CT.  It was a 2-day event, held at the Charter Oak Cultural Center in Hartford.

The following year, a new CT team went to Albuquerque for the 2nd Annual National High School Slam, along with seven other teams including San Francisco, Los Angeles and Chicago.

"I write because I need to escape" ~ Taimoni

This festival continues to grow and is now known as Brave New Voices, with up to fifty participating teams over five days. It is held in a different city each year (San Francisco, NYC, Philadelphia, Ann Arbor, Los Angeles, Chicago, Seattle) and has included teams from most major cities in the US, as well as from Bangladesh, Bosnia, India, England, Canada, South Africa, Ghana and Trinidad.

Brave New Voices presents the youth of 21st century America in all their verve and diversity.  The festival focuses on arts education and performance, local program development, national movement organizing and the highlighting of a new generation of performing artists, audiences and literary opportunity. 

"Poetry is the honesty too raw for polite conversation" ~ Michaela

Connetic Word is one of the only teams to invite participation from around the state, rather than one major city.  Members for 2015 include young writers from Rockville, Canton, Manchester, New Haven, Enfield and one member from just over the New York line.

As part of a larger organization, Connetic Word hosts poetry slams throughout the year and offers spoken word workshops and slam orientations for schools and youth organizations in the Northeast. We provide an outlet and a stage for young writers and performers. We help empower confident, engaged, literate, ethical and critically conscious young men and women with events that showcase the talent and passion of young people.

“Connetic Word changes lives.  It helps create a supportive community, as well as literary and stage opportunities that were not available when I was a struggling teenager, trying to find my voice,” says founder and organizer, Elizabeth Thomas. 

"Write like your life depends on it!" ~ Elizabeth

Elizabeth Thomas, along with Devin Samuels, a graduate of UConn, Ryan Parker, a teacher at Illing Middle School in Manchester, Emily Falkowski, a former team member and Laura Maiocco, a teacher at Sheehan High School in Wallingford serve as volunteer coaches/ chaperones/organizers for the Connecticut team.

As adult volunteers, we wholeheartedly give of our time and energy throughout the year to help these talented young people find their voice and engage with an audience. 

And now, we are asking for your help to bring the team to Atlanta, GA for Brave New Voices 2015 being held in July.  The money we raise will be used for the $1250 registration fee to cover our lodging, breakfast and entry into all events, our team transportation costs which include airline tickets for seven and hopefully a team celebratory meal while in Atlanta, GA.  Any money left over will be used to help fund next year’s team.

In past years, as part of our fundraising efforts, members of the CT team have provided workshops and performances including:

- The Bushnell Young Writer's Collaborative
- UConn Poetic Release student workshops & feature
- Greater Hartford Arts Academy
- The Graduate Institute’s Oral Traditions Conference (for new teachers)
-  CT IMPAC Young Writer’s Annual Fundraiser
- Sunken Garden Poetry Festival
-  Council for Children in Crisis - Humanitarian Award Event
-  World Scholar/Athlete Games
-  International Festival of Arts and Ideas
-  Oddfellows Playhouse, Middletown
-  Riverwood Poetry Festival

These programs build community, as well as helping promote literacy and the power of written and spoken word.  We are changing lives, writing as if our lives (and yours) depended on it!

Short Summary

Dear Family,

The sun is shining again; well, it always has been, but now I see and feel it :) In 2014, I participated in an international book project. This project was published in Feb 2016. 

I am therefore offering this book I for a donation of $20. 

Also, because we launched the Constance Sithole foundation in 2014, I will donate some of the proceeds towards this scholarship which support 7 children from Glen-View 4 primary school, the school where my mother taught; and Glen-View 1 primary school, the school where I attained my primary school education.

I am thankful for your continued support.

Much love

Joy

story:
Annexe Magazine is releasing for pre-order 25 copies of JT Welsch's The Ruin and Susie Campbell's The Frock Enquiry. This is a very limited first run (50 copies) so you are guaranteeing yourself a copy by pre-ordering one!

What are they?

Susie Campbell's The Frock Enquiry uses the Enquiry into Women's Work by The Women's Industrial Council 1900-15 as its backbone. It imagines how these working women might have constructed voices for themselves out of the language of their work - taking it apart and reassembling it to forge a new and 'unnatural' rhetoric of interrogation, myth and protest. 


JT Welsch's The Ruin is set in the ruins of Tunisia and jumps between Carthage, old Star Wars sets, empty hotels, and the footsteps of other visiting artists and writers, exploring and raising difficult questions on the role of tourism and cultural appropriation in the wake of the 2011 revolution.



Who are they?

Susie Campbell's poetry has been published in print and online magazines including The Interpreter's House, Shearsman, Domestic Cherry, Envoi, Smiths Knoll, Amaryllis, Verity La and Litmus. Her first poetry pamphlet The Bitters was published by Dancing Girl Press in 2014. In the same year she also competed an MA in creative writing at Oxford University and was the inaugural recipient of Oxford's F.H.Pasby prize. She works in a full time job providing services to disabled young people and is currently completing a first novel, set in the world of mental health care. 

JT Welsch has published four pamphlets of poetry, including Orchids (Salt) and Waterloo (Like This). His poems have also appeared in 3AM, Blackbox Manifold, Boston Review, Manchester Review, PN Review, VLAK, and other magazines and anthologies. He lives with his partner and dog in York, where he is lecturer in Creative Writing and English Literature at York St John University.


What is Annexe Magazine?

Founded in 2011 by Nick Murray, Annexe Magazine has curated and published the Annexe Introducing series, produced shows in numerous venues, printed posters, recorded podcasts, created mixtapes, and invented full scale games for fifty people to play at a time. For three years running it produced the Interrobang Festival, a day long festival of prose, poetry, music, theatre and comedy.

Annexe is sadly closing this year, these two pamphlets are its last publications. We hope to see you at the London launch on 23rd October, which will also be a celebration of Annexe's work over the years.

The two pamphlets were edited by Claire Trévien. They will be hand-bound by Lucie Forejtová at Immaginacija.

story:
The Project

Hi my name is Victoria Barkan and I’m here to ask for your help to get my book entitled "The Monkeys Rule" finished and published. The outline is complete and I have about a third of it written.  I have been working on it for about 15 years.  Actually most of that time was spent learning what I was to write about.  I have to laugh now as the (politically correct) reason I gave for leaving the consulting firm I was working for many years ago was to write this book, thinking that I knew what was to be in the book.  Little did I know that I had just started down this path of learning...learning and experiencing spiritual growth. 

I came out of a corporate career where my successes and innate ability threatened a lot of people. As a result, I experienced discrimination and unfair treatment of several different types. Yea, I know you might find that hard to believe given I was in a corporate environment but it is true...really. After several decades of mistreatment I was changed, I mean really angry. A friend called it rage...ready to go postal.  I mean can you believe it...I had a list.  I totally bought into the victim mentality at a deep subconscious level.

At the time I had no idea what the law of attraction was or how my thoughts and programming (conscious and unconscious) affected how the law of attraction worked for me.  I had no idea how those thoughts and programming which turn into beliefs especially the unconscious ones, really run a person’s life.  I call them the Monkeys. 

The book is about my experiences, the discrimination that kept me from earning the living I was capable of earning and going to the levels I could have gone, the anger that then accumulated, my discovery of the monkeys and how they engaged my anger, then the journey to learn to tame them.  I learned all of this on the road to discovering how one is responsible for every single thing that happens to oneself in life...a concept that was difficult for me to comprehend in the beginning. After all I did not do those things to me..."they did"...chuckle!

What we need and what you get.

To get this project to completion I need seed money to move forward. I must raise $1000 for Fractured Atlas to show that I can raise money on my own and then I can be helped to procure grant money.  The most pressing need now is a new computer which is a must as mine is very old and has difficulty interfacing with the websites I’m working on.  Just the other day my 4 in one printer, copier, fax and scanner died and my camera is also broken.  Additionally, I need a piece of equipment to convert slides and photos to digital format for insertion into the book.  The $4500 is only enough to get me started. There will also be expenses for websites and editors to speak of only a few which is why Fractured Atlas and the hope for grant money is so important.

Oh! And let’s not forget the funding for the Perks and their shipping.  I have created several perks that are fun and represent your ground floor involvement in helping me move forward with this project.  At some of the higher levels of giving you get signed ‘original limited edition prints’ of “The Monkeys Rule: Insatiable” I painted it from a picture of the Nazca Lines Monkey I took on a trip to Peru back when I was working...lots of symbolism in that painting which will be the cover of the book.  You can see the painting on this website and ONE lucky person can even claim the original 30” x 30” acrylic on canvas.  Of course there are other perks like copies of the E-Book, signed copies of the printed book and special commemorative T-Shirts, depending on the level of contribution you choose.

Your contributions are tax deductable to the extent the law allows.   The fair market value stated under each perk must be deducted from the total contribution to arrive at the amount of your contribution that is tax deductable depending on your individual situation.  If you prefer a total tax deduction and do not want any perks, just name your contribution level. 

So what is the Impact? 

This book can be a bridge for those who are awakening to their spiritual growth.  This has little to do with organized religion in the literal sense and everything to do with increasing your consciousness level and vibrational frequency.  There has been a lot published lately about the Law of Attraction but none of those authors deal with the Monkeys.  The Monkeys that keep the Law of Attraction from working the way we consciously want.

My hope is to open a world of modalities that deal with the Monkeys that up to now have only been there for the few with the courage to open their minds and lead the way to change.  This book can serve to give those ready, those that have reached the level of integrity and courage, the help they need to move forward and tame their Monkeys creating a better life for themselves and therefore the world. If it helps only one person I will consider the book a success!

What if I can’t contribute at this time?

Please send us your love and help us get the word out.  You may touch someone who even wants to become my publisher!  Share the link to this page on facebook.  Post it on your blog. Tweet it. E-mail and talk to people.  You never know who will resonate with this project.  Use the share tools available on this website.

Thank you all for you interest, help and support!!!!!

The Project
Hi my name is Victoria Barkan and I’m here to ask for your help to get my book entitled "The Monkeys Rule" finished and published. The outline is complete and I have about a third of it written.  I have been working on it for about 15 years.  Actually most of that time was spent learning what I was to write about.  I have to laugh now as the (politically correct) reason I gave for leaving the consulting firm I was working for many years ago was to write this book, thinking that I knew what was to be in the book.  Little did I know that I had just started down this path of learning...learning and experiencing spiritual growth. 
I came out of a corporate career where my successes and innate ability threatened a lot of people. As a result, I experienced discrimination and unfair treatment of several different types. Yea, I know you might find that hard to believe given I was in a corporate environment but it is true...really. After several decades of mistreatment I was changed, I mean really angry. A friend called it rage...ready to go postal.  I mean can you believe it...I had a list.  I totally bought into the victim mentality at a deep subconscious level.
At the time I had no idea what the law of attraction was or how my thoughts and programming (conscious and unconscious) affected how the law of attraction worked for me.  I had no idea how those thoughts and programming which turn into beliefs especially the unconscious ones, really run a person’s life.  I call them the Monkeys.  
The book is about my experiences, the discrimination that kept me from earning the living I was capable of earning and going to the levels I could have gone, the anger that then accumulated, my discovery of the monkeys and how they engaged my anger, then the journey to learn to tame them.  I learned all of this on the road to discovering how one is responsible for every single thing that happens to oneself in life...a concept that was difficult for me to comprehend in the beginning. After all I did not do those things to me..."they did"...chuckle!
What we need and what you get.
To get this project to completion I need seed money to move forward. I must raise $1000 for Fractured Atlas to show that I can raise money on my own and then I can be helped to procure grant money.  The most pressing need now is a new computer which is a must as mine is very old and has difficulty interfacing with the websites I’m working on.  Just the other day my 4 in one printer, copier, fax and scanner died and my camera is also broken.  Additionally, I need a piece of equipment to convert slides and photos to digital format for insertion into the book.  The $4500 is only enough to get me started. There will also be expenses for websites and editors to speak of only a few which is why Fractured Atlas and the hope for grant money is so important.
Oh! And let’s not forget the funding for the Perks and their shipping.  I have created several perks that are fun and represent your ground floor involvement in helping me move forward with this project.  At some of the higher levels of giving you get signed ‘original limited edition prints’ of “The Monkeys Rule: Insatiable” I painted it from a picture of the Nazca Lines Monkey I took on a trip to Peru back when I was working...lots of symbolism in that painting which will be the cover of the book.  You can see the painting on this website and ONE lucky person can even claim the original 30” x 30” acrylic on canvas.  Of course there are other perks like copies of the E-Book, signed copies of the printed book and special commemorative T-Shirts, depending on the level of contribution you choose.
Your contributions are tax deductable to the extent the law allows.   The fair market value stated under each perk must be deducted from the total contribution to arrive at the amount of your contribution that is tax deductable depending on your individual situation.  If you prefer a total tax deduction and do not want any perks, just name your contribution level. 
So what is the Impact?  
This book can be a bridge for those who are awakening to their spiritual growth.  This has little to do with organized religion in the literal sense and everything to do with increasing your consciousness level and vibrational frequency.  There has been a lot published lately about the Law of Attraction but none of those authors deal with the Monkeys.  The Monkeys that keep the Law of Attraction from working the way we consciously want.
My hope is to open a world of modalities that deal with the Monkeys that up to now have only been there for the few with the courage to open their minds and lead the way to change.  This book can serve to give those ready, those that have reached the level of integrity and courage, the help they need to move forward and tame their Monkeys creating a better life for themselves and therefore the world. If it helps only one person I will consider the book a success!
What if I can’t contribute at this time?
Please send us your love and help us get the word out.  You may touch someone who even wants to become my publisher!  Share the link to this page on facebook.  Post it on your blog. Tweet it. E-mail and talk to people.  You never know who will resonate with this project.  Use the share tools available on this website.
Thank you all for you interest, help and support!!!!!

story:
Short Summary

The French canadian publishing house "Dedicaces" is preparing to publish their first book for children entitled "Platon le Suricate" (Plato Meerkat). Written by Quebec's Francine Minville (FanFan) and illustrated by Belgian Jean-Francois Debaty (Schmurl), then this first album will include a series of books by the same name. A summary of this first album:

Voici la toute première aventure de Platon le Suricate. Platon est le plus futé parmi tous les animaux du désert. Il affronte souvent le danger et doit trouver une solution à tous les problèmes.

Platon et le scorpion Tifon sont les meilleurs amis du monde, mais nul ne doit connaître leur petit secret… Samson, le grand méchant aigle, met tout en oeuvre pour attraper sa prochaine proie, mais Platon a plus d’un tour dans son sac ! Réussira-t-il le plan qu’il s’apprête à exécuter avec Tifon pour échapper aux griffes du redoutable Samson ?

Découvre Platon et  sa bande d’amis dans les plaines d’Afrique australe, pour des aventures pleines de rebondissements !

___________

Here is the first adventure of the Meerkat plato. Plato is the smartest of all animals of the desert. He often faces the danger and must find a solution to all problems.

Plato and the scorpion Tifon are the best friends, but no one must know their ecret ... Samson, the big bad eagle, makes every effort to catch his next prey, but Plato has more tricks up his sleeve! He will succeed the plan he is about to execute Tifon to escape the clutches of the dreaded Samson?

Discover Plato's and his gang of friends in the plains of southern Africa, for adventures full of surprises!

What We Need & What You Get

Funding will be used primarily to cover the costs of design and printing for a first printing of 1,000 copies. These copies will be sold in many online stores including Amazon, eBay, Abebooks and Biblio. Initially, the books will be distributed in bookstores in Quebec, and then spread to libraries in Europe. This first album entitled "Plato Meerkat" will fit into a book series of the same name. There may be additional draws.

Contributors will receive certificates of donors and copies of the book (signed or unsigned). For a donation of $ 100, their names will also be added in the book.

About the publishing house "Dedicaces" (Montreal, Canada)

The French canadian publishing house "Dedicaces" was created in March 2009. In a very short time, our company has gained an international reputation. It publishes authors from several countries: France, Belgium, Switzerland, England, Republic of Congo, Algeria, Argentina, USA, Canada... (see catalog). Our publishing house sell their books in several online stores, including Amazon, Smashwords, Payloadz, eBay, Abebooks and Biblio. Moreover, the publishing house become the first publisher to bring to market its own eBook reader (see here).

The French canadian publishing house "Dedicaces" is involved in several book fairs in Europe and Canada, including three consecutive years at the Paris Book Fair (watch the video).

story:
Hey there!

Thank you for your interested in my project.
You will find a German version and an English translation in the main text.

Due to limited allowance of words, you will find the English translation for the Perks in the attached PDF file, which you can find in the "gallery", as well as the English trailer and one more trailer.

 

Here is the link:

http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/a-story-full-...

  

ENGLISH VERSION

Summary

'The Threads of Moira' is a novel full of action, drama, excitement, romance and humor. It combines several genres and spans its bow refined over the past, the present and the future. It is filled with phantasy and fiction, but it's also relative to normal life. It's philosophical, psychological, emotional and political.

 

“The Threads of Moira,” a mystery novel, is based on two major themes: Ariadne’s thread in the Labyrinth, and the role of predestination in life – the fates as it were.  Greek mythology refers to the fates as the Moirai.  In the Homeric poems, the fate called Moira is related to the end of one's life.  The novel is actually three interwoven stories that mirror the labyrinth of life. It is about the so-called  thread that we consciously or unconsciously follow until we are called home.

Holly Edwards receives a letter in the mail one day from someone she does not even know. In the envelope is a copy of a scientific journal article, along with a warning that it is for Holly's eyes only - not to be shared with anyone, kept secret.  Holly believes it was sent to her by mistake and decides to return the letter.  Just then, someone knocks on her front door and identifies himself as an FBI agent.  Holly is questioned by him concerning a murder that recently occurred in her neighborhood.  During this conversation Holly discovers that the sender of the letter is suspected of being the murderer. Although she knows that she should tell the agent about the mysterious letter and article, her intuition tells her not to. Instead, she conceals it.

 

The next morning Holly receives another letter – this one threatening. She sets out to find answers and is led to a secret scientific circle.  From there, Holly becomes entangled in ever more mysterious, nerve-wracking events. Eventually, what she learns not only totally shatters her worldview and puts her life in extreme danger, but also makes her aware that humanity itself is in grave danger. 

 

The “story within the story” is about Holly's deceased grandparents who often come to mind in the midst of her travails.  Their wisdom, which Holly never fully appreciated or understood, turns out to not only be her greatest help, but awakens her to the deepest and most profound truths about herself.

 

Ultimately, the reader gets decides what is fiction and what is reality as Holly goes on the journey of her life - a Hero’s Journey in which she must fully explore all her traits, foibles and aspects, find and utilize every ability she has, and actualize her full potential. 

 

ABOUT JANE RUSSO AND THE PROJECT

 

Jane Russo is a pseudonym that I chose to write mystery novels.

I am a German author who has been successful in writing and publishing books in other genres. So far I have made my living within psychological, psychic, artistic and social media marketing areas.

The threads of Moira is my first work in the field of mystery novels, or at least my first work that I intend to make available to the public. A novel that will be exciting not only within the main story, but also within the emotional development of the protagonist. A novel that is close to reality and yet fiction.

The story already exists in its basic structure, it only has to be written down, which will take me about one year. After that is has to become edited by an editor, to be set by a graphic designer and finally published. Subsequently I want to get the book translated into English and make it available as an e-book as well as a print edition for the English speaking world.

Parallel to writing the book, I plan to frequently post parts of the MAKING OF at the new offical Jane Russo blog  JaneRussoNovels.blogspot.com. I imagine to publish passages and quotes of the progressing book, to get people involved in the writing development.

Those who have supported my book project with a huge amount of money will have the chance to help shape, by voting about characters, appearance, names and origin of the supporting actors. And of course those sponsors will be mentioned in the book not only as official sponsors, but also as active members of the creative team, if they wish.

(see all PERKS DESCRIPTION in the attached PDF to get more information)

I welcome everybody to friendship me at my Facebook and Google+ page and to follow me at my Twitter acount and help me to make the book known. I would like to present the book in March 2014 at the Leipzig Book Fair. If it needs more time to get the final work to be realized, I would bring it to the book fair in Frankfurt in autumn 2014.

My contribution that I would like to give to the world as a token of gratitude to all the people who support my project, is to make the e-book available for free for all deaf-mute people and to grant a huge discount on the e-book for students and those among us, who cannot afford to buy a hardcover-book. 

While the book gets edited, I plan to also get an interactive iPhone/Android/Windows app to be developed, which will be another Indiegogo project to being financed, which will bring good advertisement chances for sponsors. 

Another intention, which I would like to realize as a subsequent project is to get the book implemented as an audiobook which I would like to give away free for blind people.

 

GERMAN VERSION

Kurzbeschreibung

'Die Fäden der Moira' ist ein Roman voller Action, Spannung, Romantik, Drama und Humor. Die Geschichte bewegt sich innerhalb verschiedener Genres und spannt ihren Bogen raffiniert über Vergangenheit, Gegenwart und Zukunft. Sie ist angefüllt mit Fantasie und Fiktion, und verliert dennoch nicht ihren Bezug zum normalen Leben. Sie ist philosophisch, psychologisch, emotional und politisch. Eine Geschichte in einer Geschichte in einer Geschichte, in der am Ende der Leser selbst entscheiden muss, was Realität und was Wahrheit ist.

  

Eines Tages erhält das Dienstmädchen Molly Edwards einen mysteriösen Brief einer ihr Unbekannten, dessen Inhalt, eine wissenschaftliche Arbeit sie gut verwahren und ausschließlich der Verfasserin selbst aushändigen soll.

Der Überzeugung, dass es sich um ein Missverständnis handelt, beschließt sie den Brief an die Absenderin Sharon Andrews zurückzuschicken.

 

Doch noch am selben Abend erhält sie unerwarteten Besuch von einem Detective des FBI, der ihr Fragen zu einem Mordfall stellt, der sich in der Nachbarschaft ereignet hat. Dabei erfährt sie, dass die Absenderin des Briefs unter Mordverdacht steht. Obwohl ihr bewusst ist, dass sie von dem Brief erzählen sollte, hält sie irgendetwas davon ab.

 

Als sie am nächsten Morgen einen Drohbrief erhält, macht sie sich auf die Suche nach Antworten und verstrickt sich dabei immer mehr in mysteriöse Ereignisse, die nicht nur ihr Weltbild aus den Angeln heben und ihr Leben in Gefahr bringen, sondern deren Folge eine Bedrohung für die gesamteWeltbevölkerung bedeuten könnte.

 

ÜBER JANE RUSSO UND DAS PROJEKT

Jane Russo ist ein Pseudonym, das ICH gewählt habe um Kriminalromane zu schreiben.Hinter dem ICH steht eine deutsche Autorin, die bereits in anderen Genres erfolgreich Bücher verfasst und verlegt hat.
Bisher habe ich sowohl in psychologischen, parapsychologischen als auch künstlerischen und Social Media Marketing Bereichen meinen Lebensunterhalt verdient.Die Fäden der Moira ist mein Erstlingswerk im Bereich 'Kriminalroman' oder zumindest mein Erstlingswerk, das ich beabsichtige der Öffentlichkeit zugänglich zu machen.
 
Ein Roman, in dem nicht nur Spannung in der eigentlichen Geschichte, sondern auch in der emotionalen Entwicklung der Protagonistin zu finden sein wird. Ein Roman, der nah an der Realität und doch Fiktion ist.
 
Die Geschichte ist in ihrer Grundstruktur bereits vorhanden, nur geschrieben werden muss sie noch, wofür ich realistisch gesehen in etwa ein Jahr benötigen werde. Anschließend muss das Buch von einem Lektor korrigiert, von einem Grafiker gesetzt und endgültig gestaltet und letztlich verlegt werden.
 
Im Anschluss daran soll das Buch ins Englische übersetzt und auch für den englischen Markt sowohl als E-book als auch als Printausgabe verfügbar gemacht werden. Parallel zum Schreiben plane ich auf dem neuen offiziellen Buchblog JaneRussoBlog.blogspot.de dem interessierten Leser einen Teil des MAKING OF verfügbar zu machen.
 
Ich stelle mir vor dort Textpassagen und Zitate aus dem werdenden Buch zu posten, um Interessierte in die Buchentstehung zu involvieren.
 
Diejenigen Sponsoren, die sehr hohe Beträge gespendet haben, werden die Möglichkeit erhalten über Charaktere, Namen, Herkunft und Aussehen der Nebendarsteller abzustimmen.
 
Selbstverständlich werden diese im Buch dann auch nicht nur als offizielle Sponsoren, sondern auch als aktive Mitglieder des Kreativteams genannt, sofern sie das wünschen.
 
(eine genauere Erklärung finden Sie im, an mein Projekt angefügten PDF, in dem die  Perks im Details in Deutsch und Englisch erklärt werden)
 
Natürlich wird es auch eine Facebook, Twitter und Google+ Seite geben, um das Buch bekannt zu machen. Ich würde das Buch gerne im März 2014 auf der Leipziger Buchmesse vorstellen. Sollte dieser Termin mit den abschließenden Arbeiten nicht realisierbar sein, so würde ich es auf die Buchmesse in Frankfurt im Herbst 2014 bringen. 
 

Meinen Beitrag, den ich als Zeichen der Dankbarkeit für all diejenigen, die mein Projekt unterstützen in der Welt leisten möchte, besteht darin das E-book für alle taubstummen Menschen kostenlos verfügbar zu machen. Weiterhin möchte ich Schülern, Studenten und denjenigen unter uns, die es sich nicht leisten können sich ein Printbuch zu kaufen, das E-Book zum stark vergünstigten Preis anbieten.

Sobald sich das Buch im Endstadium der Produktion befindet, plane ich eine interaktive iPhone/Android/Windows App entwickeln zu lassen. Ein Anschlussprojekt, das dann neu finanziert werden muss und das für Sponsoren eine gute Werbemöglichkeit darstellen wird.

Eine weitere Absicht, die ich im Anschluss and das Buch beabsichtige zu realisieren, ist die Umsetzung des Buchs in ein Hörbuch, das für Blinde Menschen kostenlos zur Verfügung stehen soll.

 

GERMAN VERSION

Was wir brauchen & Was man bekommt

Das alles benötigt Zeit und Geld. 
Realistisch gesehen benötige ich ein Jahr, um das Buch, das in etwa 350 Seiten umfassen wird zu schreiben.

Die Zeit kann ich verfügbar machen, wenn ich finanzielle Unterstützung erhalte.

Hier ist eine kurze Auflistung der Gelder, die in etwa benötigt werden:

31.000 €     Autorenhonorar inklusive dt. Sozialabgaben und 7% USt.
  4.000€      Lektorat
     850€      Buchsatz
     150€      Erstellung E-book
17.000€      Übersetzung ins Englische
_______     benötigte Gesamtsumme
53.000€
 

   

ENGLISH VERSION

What we need & what you get

 

This all takes time and money.
Realistically I need about one year to write the book, which will include approximately 350 pages.

 

I can make the time available, if I get financial support.

 

Here is a brief listing of the about funds that are needed:

 


   € 31,000    author's fee, including German social security and 7% VAT
    € 4,000    proofreading
      € 850    book set
      € 150    e-book creation
  € 17,000   translation into English
_______     

€ 53,000    Required total

 

GERMAN VERSION

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Natürlich freue ich mich über jeglich Unterstützung, auch wenn diese nicht monetärer Art ausfällt. Wenn Sie sich von meinem Projekt angesprochen fühlen, können Sie mich auch unterstützen, indem Sie vielen Menschen davon erzählen, mein Video teilen und meine Kampagne dadurch bekannt machen.

Dazu können Sie auch das Tool von Indigogo benutzen.

Vielen Dank
Herzlichst Ihre 

 

Jane Russo

 

ENGLISH VERSION

Different ways, how you can help

Of course I'm happy about any support, even if it is not on a  monetary basis. If you feel inspired by my project, you can help me by telling many people about it, share my video and thus make my campaign well known.

For this purpose you can also use the tool of Indigogo

Thank you very much
Yours

 

Jane Russo

Als sie am nächsten Morgen einen Drohbrief erhält, macht sie sich auf die Suche nach Antworten und verstrickt sich dabei immer mehr in mysteriöse Ereignisse, die nicht nur ihr Weltbild aus den Angeln heben und ihr Leben in Gefahr bringen, sondern deren Folge eine Bedrohung für die gesamteWeltbevölkerung bedeuten könnte.
 
ÜBER JANE RUSSO UND DAS PROJEKT
Jane Russo ist ein Pseudonym, das ICH gewählt habe um Kriminalromane zu schreiben.Hinter dem ICH steht eine deutsche Autorin, die bereits in anderen Genres erfolgreich Bücher verfasst und verlegt hat.Bisher habe ich sowohl in psychologischen, parapsychologischen als auch künstlerischen und Social Media Marketing Bereichen meinen Lebensunterhalt verdient.Die Fäden der Moira ist mein Erstlingswerk im Bereich 'Kriminalroman' oder zumindest mein Erstlingswerk, das ich beabsichtige der Öffentlichkeit zugänglich zu machen.
 
Ein Roman, in dem nicht nur Spannung in der eigentlichen Geschichte, sondern auch in der emotionalen Entwicklung der Protagonistin zu finden sein wird. Ein Roman, der nah an der Realität und doch Fiktion ist.
 
Die Geschichte ist in ihrer Grundstruktur bereits vorhanden, nur geschrieben werden muss sie noch, wofür ich realistisch gesehen in etwa ein Jahr benötigen werde. Anschließend muss das Buch von einem Lektor korrigiert, von einem Grafiker gesetzt und endgültig gestaltet und letztlich verlegt werden.
 
Im Anschluss daran soll das Buch ins Englische übersetzt und auch für den englischen Markt sowohl als E-book als auch als Printausgabe verfügbar gemacht werden. Parallel zum Schreiben plane ich auf dem neuen offiziellen Buchblog JaneRussoBlog.blogspot.de dem interessierten Leser einen Teil des MAKING OF verfügbar zu machen.
 
Ich stelle mir vor dort Textpassagen und Zitate aus dem werdenden Buch zu posten, um Interessierte in die Buchentstehung zu involvieren.
 
Diejenigen Sponsoren, die sehr hohe Beträge gespendet haben, werden die Möglichkeit erhalten über Charaktere, Namen, Herkunft und Aussehen der Nebendarsteller abzustimmen.
 
Selbstverständlich werden diese im Buch dann auch nicht nur als offizielle Sponsoren, sondern auch als aktive Mitglieder des Kreativteams genannt, sofern sie das wünschen.
 
(eine genauere Erklärung finden Sie im, an mein Projekt angefügten PDF, in dem die  Perks im Details in Deutsch und Englisch erklärt werden)
 
Natürlich wird es auch eine Facebook, Twitter und Google+ Seite geben, um das Buch bekannt zu machen. Ich würde das Buch gerne im März 2014 auf der Leipziger Buchmesse vorstellen. Sollte dieser Termin mit den abschließenden Arbeiten nicht realisierbar sein, so würde ich es auf die Buchmesse in Frankfurt im Herbst 2014 bringen. 
 

Meinen Beitrag, den ich als Zeichen der Dankbarkeit für all diejenigen, die mein Projekt unterstützen in der Welt leisten möchte, besteht darin das E-book für alle taubstummen Menschen kostenlos verfügbar zu machen. Weiterhin möchte ich Schülern, Studenten und denjenigen unter uns, die es sich nicht leisten können sich ein Printbuch zu kaufen, das E-Book zum stark vergünstigten Preis anbieten.
Sobald sich das Buch im Endstadium der Produktion befindet, plane ich eine interaktive iPhone/Android/Windows App entwickeln zu lassen. Ein Anschlussprojekt, das dann neu finanziert werden muss und das für Sponsoren eine gute Werbemöglichkeit darstellen wird.
Eine weitere Absicht, die ich im Anschluss and das Buch beabsichtige zu realisieren, ist die Umsetzung des Buchs in ein Hörbuch, das für Blinde Menschen kostenlos zur Verfügung stehen soll.

 
GERMAN VERSION


Was wir brauchen & Was man bekommt
Das alles benötigt Zeit und Geld. Realistisch gesehen benötige ich ein Jahr, um das Buch, das in etwa 350 Seiten umfassen wird zu schreiben.
Die Zeit kann ich verfügbar machen, wenn ich finanzielle Unterstützung erhalte.Hier ist eine kurze Auflistung der Gelder, die in etwa benötigt werden:
31.000 €     Autorenhonorar inklusive dt. Sozialabgaben und 7% USt.  4.000€      Lektorat     850€      Buchsatz     150€      Erstellung E-book17.000€      Übersetzung ins Englische_______     benötigte Gesamtsumme53.000€  
   
ENGLISH VERSION
What we need & what you get
 
This all takes time and money.Realistically I need about one year to write the book, which will include approximately 350 pages.
 
I can make the time available, if I get financial support.
 
Here is a brief listing of the about funds that are needed:
 
   € 31,000    author's fee, including German social security and 7% VAT    € 4,000    proofreading      € 850    book set      € 150    e-book creation  € 17,000   translation into English_______     
€ 53,000    Required total
 


GERMAN VERSION
Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann
Natürlich freue ich mich über jeglich Unterstützung, auch wenn diese nicht monetärer Art ausfällt. Wenn Sie sich von meinem Projekt angesprochen fühlen, können Sie mich auch unterstützen, indem Sie vielen Menschen davon erzählen, mein Video teilen und meine Kampagne dadurch bekannt machen.Dazu können Sie auch das Tool von Indigogo benutzen.
Vielen DankHerzlichst Ihre 
 
Jane Russo
 
ENGLISH VERSION
Different ways, how you can help
Of course I'm happy about any support, even if it is not on a  monetary basis. If you feel inspired by my project, you can help me by telling many people about it, share my video and thus make my campaign well known.
For this purpose you can also use the tool of Indigogo
Thank you very muchYours
 
Jane Russo

story:
Thanks to the collaborations to this campaign and other funds received, we were able to publish the book in Spanish!!!

Gracias a las colaboraciones a esta campaña y a otros donativos, pudimos publicar el libro en español!!!

MAKING THIS ADVENTURE A PART OF YOUR REALITY!

English & Spanish        Inglés & Español

All contributions are welcome!!!

My name is Luis Felipe Passalacqua, former Medical Illustrator, and now Puerto Rico’s first and only Blind Sculptor.  I've been working on this bio-fiction for the past year and now all the energy and resources are intended for its final production, publication and marketing stages.  This is my first project as a writer and truthfully, a very significant endeavor.  I've been giving conferences about my life experiences for the past fourteen years, which have given me great insight into the development of this project. I've dissected the memories of my childhood and entire adult life in order to facilitate some extreme but transformative experiences.  The story evokes a life full of contrasts that assaults our senses and provokes the intuition.  It incites the radical, the obscure, and the enigmatic.  You will be confronted by an oppressive inequality that demands evolution. I've used fragments of magical realism to ease the path of understanding the dissolution of our perceptions and realities, our freedom.

Spanish & English Video


English Video

 

The book is based on my life experiences, more than in theoretical or learned information. It comes from the core. Arts, science, and belief structures converge in this profound search for independence. 

I’m excited to be collaborating with

  ...to bring this book to you.  Because of its significance, it is my intention to publish it in Spanish and in English.  To bring this project to life we need your total commitment to cover the cost of those devoting their time and resources to make this happen, including the publishers.

*** VIDEO EN ESPAÑOL *** VIDEO EN ESPAÑOL *** VIDEO EN ESPAÑOL ***


¡HAZ QUE ESTA AVENTURA SEA PARTE DE TU REALIDAD!

¡¡Toda contribución es bienvenida!!!

Mi nombre es Luis Felipe Passalacqua, Ilustrador Médico, y ahora primer y único Escultor Invidente de Puerto Rico.  He estado trabajando en esta bio-ficción durante el pasado año y ahora toda la energía y recursos están dirigidos hacia la producción final, su publicación y  mercadeo. Éste es mi primer proyecto como escritor y verdaderamente, un esfuerzo muy significativo.  He estado dando conferencias acerca de mi vida por los últimos catorce años, y estas me han brindado gran perspectiva para el desarrollo de este libro. He analizado minuciosamente las memorias de mi niñez y vida de adulto para facilitar algunas situaciones que aunque extremas, son transformativas.  La historia evoca una vida llena de contrastes que asalta nuestros  sentidos y provoca la intuición. Incita a lo radical, a lo oscuro y a lo enigmático. La desigualdad opresiva que te confrontará, exige evolución. He utilizado fragmentos de realismo mágico para aligerar el camino que nos lleva a entender la disolución de nuestras percepciones y realidades, nuestra libertad.

Estoy muy contento de estar colaborarando con Author House para traerles este libro.  Debido a su  significado profundo, es mi intención publicarlo en español y en inglés.  Para darle vida a este proyecto, necesitamos su compromiso total para ayudar a cubrir el costo de aquellos que han dedicado su tiempo y recursos para lograrlo , incluyendo a los publicadores.

YOU CAN MAKE THIS POSSIBLE BY SPONSORING ME!

¡Tu puedes hacer esto posible brindándome tu respaldo!

English & Spanish Video


As my personal gratitude to you...

Como agradecimiento personal...


18" sculptures & others!
Autographed copies of the book & bookmarks.  See details under Perks.

  • Copias autografiadas y marcadores de libro.
  • Unique Limited Edition 24"  Sculptures!  Created by the author just for this project.  Includes certificate of authenticity.  See details under Perks.
  • Esculturas de 24" de alto, edición limitada.  Ver detalles bajo "Perks"
  • Unique Limited Edition 18"  Sculptures!  Created by the author just for this project.  Includes certificate of authenticity.  See details under Perks.
  • Esculturas de 18" de alto, edición limitada.  Ver detalles bajo "Perks"
  • Unique Limited Edition 8"  Sculptures!  Created by the author just for this project.  Includes certificate of authenticity.  See details under Perks.
  • Esculturas de 8" de alto, edición limitada.  Ver detalles bajo "Perks"
  • Conferences & Workshops! with the Author.  See details under Perks. 
  • Conferencias y talleres.  Ver detalles bajo "Perks"
  • Unique baseball caps.  See details under Perks. 
  • Gorras.  Ver detalles bajo "Perks"
  • Other perks may be announced as the campaign progresses.
  • Otros se podrían añadir según progrese la campaña.



Just like all significant ventures, there are costs to getting it done.  I am ethically and financially responsible to my sponsors and collaborators. Please read the breakdown of my expenses and intended funding amounts.
Como todo proyecto de alcance significativo, hay costos para llevarlo a cabo.  Me siento éticamente responsable  hacia mis patrocinadores y colaboradores.  Por favor, lean como se administrará el dinero. 


                   

If our goal of $18,000 is not reached,  funds accrued by the end of the campaign will be used for the creation and publishing of the Spanish version of this book.

Si nuestra meta de $18,000 no es alcanzada, los fondos disponibles al final de la campaña serán utilizados en la creación y publicación de la versión en español.


                


DESIRED IMPACT

Our hopes are that "él" (Spanish) and"he" (English), motivate the reader towards self examination as an individual and as part of society, creating awareness of the ignorance, the prejudice and the obstacles that a person faces when segregated, or belongs to a minority.  It is our intention to condemn the consequences of such ideas and attitudes that may cause difficulties for some in the rehabilitation, the access to equal opportunities, and the total participation of all that the society to which he belongs, has to offer.

IMPACTO DESEADO

Nuestra esperanza es que  “él” (español) y " he” (inglés), motiven al lector  a examinarse  a si mismo y a la sociedad en que vive, creando conciencia sobre la ignorancia, el prejudicio y los obstáculos a los que una persona hace frente cuando es segregada, o pertenece a una minoría.  Es nuestra intención señalar las consecuencias de tales ideas y actitudes que puedan causar dificultades para algunos en su rehabilitación, en el acceso a oportunidades justas, y su participación de todo lo que la sociedad a la que pertenece, pueda ofrecer.


ABOUT THE AUTHOR

Luis Felipe Passalacqua, Puerto Rico’s first and only blind sculptor was born in Santurce and grew up in his family’s country house in Guaynabo.  He studied at the Sacred Heart University, receiving a Baccalaureate in Sciences, concentration in Pre-Med, and a Post Baccalaureate degree in Medical Illustration from Ohio State University, in 1990.  That same year he founded his own illustration company, Worldwide Biomedic Images.  In 1995, he loses his eyesight due to meningitis, returning to Puerto Rico in 1996.  After the physical crisis, he starts his long journey of exploration of a new world in darkness, facing ignorance, fear and discrimination.  After making the decision to continue as an artist, he studies sculpture at the San Juan’s Art League and later at the Plastic Arts School, also in San Juan.  In 2001 He begins a professional career as a sculptor, motivational speaker, arts professor and museum accessibility consultant.  Luis Felipe has offered multiple individual and collective exhibitions in and outside of Puerto Rico, represented the island in two international festivals, have been interviewed for various magazines, newspapers, including the Washington Post, radio and television programs, have won different recognition, including the 2006 Disabled Citizen of the Year award. 


ACERCA DEL AUTOR

Luis Felipe Passalacqua, primer y único escultor invidente de Puerto Rico, nace en Santurce, y se cría en la finca de su familia en Guaynabo.  Cursó estudios en la Universidad del Sagrado Corazón, donde se gradúa con un bachillerato en ciencias, concentración en pre-médica.  Cursa estudios especializados en Ilustración Médica en la Universidad de Ohio State, graduándose en el 1990.  Ese año funda su propia compañía de ilustración, Worldwide Biomedic Images. En el 1995, pierde su vista a causa de una meningitis.  Desalentado, regresa Puerto Rico en el 1996.  Luego de superar la crisis, ingresa como estudiante de escultura en la Liga de Arte de San Juan y luego en la Escuela de Artes Plásticas. Comienza su carrera profesional como escultor, conferenciante motivacional  y consultor en accesibilidad para muesos, en el 2001.  Ha realizado múltiples exposiciones individuales y colectivas en y fuera de Puerto Rico, ha representado la isla en dos festivales internacionales, ha sido entrevistado en diferentes revistas y periódicos (incluyendo el Washington Post), programas de radio y televisión y ha recibido diferentes reconocimientos, incluyendo el premio Gloria Alonso, como ciudadano discapacitado del 2006.     




CHALLENGES

With time and  resources on our side we must beat every single deadline to bring these outstanding publications to the public.  Author House is already working with the Spanish version but we need to jump in and capture momentum with the English project.  Our intention is to bring them out simultaneously.  This is why our backer communities are so important.  If we experience delays, the Spanish version will come out first, followed by the English translation.

  • Finances  are challenging at this point. We constantly keep strict controls.
  • We will definitely keep all deadlines in check for the next 60 days.


All contributions are welcome!!!

¡¡¡Toda contribución es bienvenida!!!

We are striving to start contributions at $25 but there are other ways you can help if you can't afford to sponsor our projects  at this time.  We understand.

Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

  •  Use the Indiegogo share tools, all the social media you are familiar with and of course - word of mouth!!!

THANK YOU FOR SPONSORING AND HELPING US ACHIEVE OUR GOAL!!!

story:
Összefoglaló

  • Két lelkes Moly-lány úgy döntött, hogy álmodik egy nagyot, és összeállít egy antológiát a Moly.hu könyves közösség tagjainak írásaiból.
  • A kötet publikálási lehetőséget biztosít amatőr, az olvasóközönség által még nem ismert alkotók számára.
  • Ezáltal nemcsak a mi kettőnk és a bekerült szerzők álma válik valóra, hanem a Moly.hu közösségének is a kezébe adhatunk egy magas színvonalat képviselő kötetet, amely a Moly több mint ötéves történetét is összegzi, és egyszersmind új perspektívába helyezi.

Amire szükségünk van, és amit te kapsz

  • A befolyt pénzösszeg a kötet nyomdai és egyéb költségeit (grafikus, tördelő honoráriuma, tiszteletpéldányok) fedezi.
  • A támogatók a hozzájárulás mértékétől függően megkapják a kötet egy példányát, illetve kisebb mértékű hozzájárulás esetén egy egyedi tervezésű könyvjelzőt.

A kötetről

  • Terjedelme kb. 200 oldal;
  • próza és líra vegyesen;
  • gyönyörű illusztrációkkal.

Hogyan segíthetsz

  • Ha személyesen nem is tudsz hozzájárulni a költségek fedezéséhez, kérünk, add tovább a hírt ismerőseidnek!
  • Bátran használd a megosztási lehetőségeket!

story:
SEX, BLOOD & VAMPIRES


"SO YOU MIGHT BE A VAMPIRE" PRINT EDITION SERIES & EBOOKS

Nobody told Bob that when he became a vampire, he would still have to keep his job at the porn-shop. Foul-mouthed, sarcastically funny, Bob is completely new to the whole vampire life. His ex-girlfriend hates him, he's addicted to blood, his Vampires Anonymous group failed... and way too many people are trying to kill him. There are over 101 ways to suck at being a vampire, and Bob is living proof.

One year into being a vampire, Bob must overcome his own addictions, misconceptions and screwed-up expectations as he comes to terms with being an instant outcast in vampire society, where most vampires are attractive trust-fund kiddies who can actually afford the vampire lifestyle.

Still forced to work his lousy day job at the porn-shop, he makes observations on everyday life, the inability to fly or anything useful like in the books, and dives into finding out just how far he can push the limits in his new life after dark without screwing everything up.

http://bit.ly/ABSVamp

http://bit.ly/SYTVamp



A month ago I released SO YOU MIGHT BE A VAMPIRE as an eBook on iBooks and Smashwords, and within a couple of days the book had landed on the hotlist for Fantasy.  A few days after that the book reached #1 Top Free Book in Contemporary Fantasy. The best thing about this campaign is that the book is already completed and edited, and available to download absolutely free! 




PRE-ORDER THE PRINT EDITIONS


I've gotten a lot of requests for a physical book, so that's what I'm making available. Using Amazon CreateSpace for the softcover and Lulu.com for the hardcover, I've been able to put together a great looking and professionally formatted printed copy of the novel.  As a bonus, I've also created special covers for each edition of the book, one of which will be exclusive to backers of this campaign.


"...a Hilarious read and a Offbeat Great story" - Ojube



And you can also pre-order the second book in the series of three "SO YOU MIGHT BE HUMAN" which will be completed for print in February 2015.  It's what I like to call the "action movie" of the series.  So You Might be Human picks up with Bob, minutes after the end of So You Might Be a Vampire.  Bob reunites with his best friend Claude, acting on a tip to end the threat of his nemesis-yes-it's-complicated-ex-girlfriend Beatrice once and for all.  Of course, nothing goes to plan and Bob ends up face to face with his lost love Jaime… but Bob is forced to make a choice to save Jaime's life… 


DOWNLOAD THE FREE EBOOK HERE




Let's make a bestselling series! I believe that there is an audience hungry for this kind of vampire novel which takes all of the usual tropes of vampire books and strips them down to the core.  The romantic vampire is all we see in popular fiction and yes, those guys do exist, but in this book, our "hero" is an ordinary guy.  I mean just look at his name: Bob.  It says it all right there.  Bob is just like you and me, and as a result, when he gets turned into a vampire, he's not all powerful and charming.  

Nope! He screws it all up and almost gets himself killed many times over… but manages to keep his sense of humour through the whole thing.  He's only been a vampire for a year, and he takes us on his journey into the world of the vampires who could live right in your city.  Bob exposes some of the myths and why they couldn't possibly ever work and he's honest and relatable.  He cusses and screams, isn't trying to be a hero and is pining after his ex-girlfriend Jaime, who wants nothing to do with him.  You know this guy, the guy who crashes on your couch and will do almost anything for you… but he just happens to be a vampire.  

That's what makes this story so different.  It's brutally honest, sarcastically funny, filled with profanity, and it's just a bitching good read.

I believe in "So You Might Be a Vampire" so much I've made it available for free to read, banking on the support of fans. So what do I want? I want you to download the book and read it and pass the word along.  I believe so strongly that you will like it, that I'm gifting the ebook to you, knowing you will appreciate the gritty, sophisticated, dark, and hilarious read, and want to invest in the series' future success.  

You can do this in a few ways:

  1. Spread the word in person and on social media and make this campaign a success. 
  2. Like the free ebook? Tip me two dollars so I can get all the caffeine fuel I need to continue writing this electric series. You will be featured as a supporter on ChasingTheSunSeries.com (See perk one).
  3. Preorder a print edition for either or both books in the series: So You Might Be a Vampire or So You Might be Human (more info below). 

Here are the links to SO YOU MIGHT BE A VAMPIRE free ebook:

Download on iBooks: http://bit.ly/ABSVamp (iPad, iPhone, iPod)
Download on Smashwords: http://bit.ly/SYTVamp (Kindle, Kobo, Nook, PDF etc)

SPREAD THE WORD & SHOW YOUR SUPPORT:

Please spread the word! I've made it easier for you by composing tweets and updates for you to borrow and modify as you wish.

There are over 101 ways to suck at being a #vampire: ask Bob. Preorder print edition and support indie writer http://igg.me/at/chasingsun/x  

Nobody told Bob that when he became a #vampire, he'd still have to keep his job at the pornshop. Support the series: http://igg.me/at/chasingsun/x  

I support Vampires Anonymous in fighting blood addiction. Support great indie book series Chasing the Sun http://igg.me/at/chasingsun/x  #vampire 

Outcast from Vampire society? Living on the fringe? Bob can show you the ropes: Read his book now: http://igg.me/at/chasingsun/x  #vampire #series 

Love Sex, Blood, and Vampires? You are going to love the Chasing the Sun series. http://igg.me/at/chasingsun/x  #vampire #series


"...an Enjoyable Twist on Vampires" - Paul Renshaw


ABOUT THE AUTHOR


RODNEY V. SMITH has been writing screenplays for over 15 years and is one of the true believers of the web series industry.  With his background in film and television, he has been involved with over 30 short films and feature films and way too many music videos.  He has been most active as a writer and cinematographer on his own web series, DOMINION and the soon to be launched OUT OF TIME. SO YOU MIGHT BE A VAMPIRE is his debut novel.


F.A.Q.

Why are you raising the money?

Through crowdfunding (raising funds online), I will be in the position to order the print editions of the book at volume prices.

When will I get my print editions?

Our estimated date of delivery are as follows:

November 2014: print editions of SO YOU MIGHT BE A VAMPIRE

February 2015: print editions of SO YOU MIGHT BE HUMAN

We plan to stick to these dates as close as possible as we really want to get the books into your hands. That being said, if a horde of vampires conspire to derail the shipping of this book in any way, I will keep you advised throughout the upcoming months of any delays (or even early arrivals). I believe that the relationship between fans and authors is based on trust, and I take your support very seriously.

What about international orders?

Please inquire by email at orders@chasingthesunseries.com regarding international orders so that I can give a proper estimation of extra costs (if any).

Why should I pre-order now instead of when the books are available?

Your support of this campaign will help make this series a success, but beyond the "feels" you will get from being an early supporter of a series you believe in, our perks have bonuses and discounted prices that will make it worth your while.

What if I don’t want a perk, I just want to contribute?

No problem, there is a button that you can select if you don’t want a perk. 

Can I increase my pledge once it’s been made?

YES!  Once you donate to our campaign, you may want to change your incentive perk to a different one, or increase your pledge amount.  Go for it!

Can I gift an incentive?

YES! That’s very awesome of you.  If you would like to donate to the book but give the perk to someone as a gift, go through the normal process of making a donation in your name.  For billing purposes, this action must be in your name.  After our deadline, we will send a message to you through IndieGoGo to the email address you provided. We will request your address from you at that time. Please reply with the information of the person who should receive the perk, and we will make sure it gets to them.  

How do we contact you?

Glad you asked!  Please go to our website for ChasingtheSunSeries.com or our Facebook page (www.facebook.com/ChasingTheSunSeries), or fire off an email at campaign@chasingthesunseries.com. We will get back to you quickly if you have questions!

story:
About By Way of Brooklyn

By Way of Brooklyn documents the stories of a new generation of influencers who have arrived in Kings County to be a part of something truly revolutionary. Whether their stay is for a year or a lifetime, they’ve come from around the globe to make their mark and claim their territory, one industry at a time. Through stunning photography, lyrical videos, in-depth interviews and collaborative events, we tell their stories and share their wonder...By Way of Brooklyn.

On the eve of our two year anniversary, we’re going back to our roots and making our first print edition. From photographers like Minnow Park, Vinny Picone, Ja Tecson and features on brands like 3sixteen, Hartland Brooklyn and Uniform Journal, the print issue is an outgrowth of the site. And it’s something you can hold in your hands, read on the train, leave on your nightstand.


What We Need & What You Get

All of the money we raise is going straight to printing and distributing. The more we get, the more we’ll print. The more we print, the more will get sent to your favorite stores across the country and around the world.

Everyone from writers to contributors have given their talents generously and for free. No one has gotten or is getting paid, from our founders to our copy editor.

The Impact

With BWOB001, we hope that you can take a break from the busyness that is information consumption, 140 characters, exhaustive viral videos, and put the device down, pick up some paper and read stories that are meant to be read with a cup of coffee in hand. On a couch or the corner table in your favorite shop. Probably on a Saturday morning.


Broke? That's okay!

If you can’t contribute, would you help spread the word? Do you know stores that BWOB001 would be perfect in? Do you have a site or your own magazine and want to feature our campaign and help tell our story? Are you poor but have lots of rich friends that you want to send this link to? Do you love social media and want to let all of your followers know about our fundraiser? Any or all is welcome.

story:
L'essentiel du projet

Kurz zusammengefasst

Pour leur deuxième livre, les éditions À verse se tournent vers le théâtre et choisissent de faire paraître Manèges de Clément Labail, une pièce originale, rythmée et poétique. Le livre paraîtra au début de 2015 sous forme bilingue (texte original en français et traduction en allemand), forme qui correspond à l'identité de cette pièce, jouée par la compagnie franco-allemande de l'auteur, tantôt dans une langue, tantôt dans l'autre.

Nous vous invitons dès maintenant à soutenir la parution de ce livre !

Das zweite Buch, das der Verlag A verse herausgeben wird, ist ein Theatertext: “Manèges” von Clément Labail. Originell, poetisch, rythmisch. Das Buch wird Anfang 2015 in einer zweisprachigen Ausgabe (Ursprungstext auf Französisch, Übersetzung auf Deutsch) veröffentlicht. Die Zweisprachigkeit passt zur Identität dieses Stückes, welches von der vom Autor gegründeten deutsch-französischen Theatergruppe Au fil des nuages in beiden Sprachen inszeniert und aufgeführt wurde.

Seien Sie dabei und unterstützen Sie schon jetzt die Veröffentlichung des Buches!

Manèges : un nouveau défi pour les éditions A verse

À verse est une association loi 1901 qui édite une revue semestrielle de poésie depuis 2008, désormais ancrée dans le paysage de la jeune poésie contemporaine et reconnue par ses pairs. À ce titre, elle est invitée et participe régulièrement à de très nombreux salons du livre et de poésie dans toute la France, et est distribuée en France et en Europe.

A verse hat sich als Association 1901 (gemeinnütziger, eingetragener Verein nach dem Gesetz des 1.Juli 1901) in Frankreich gegründet und bringt seit 2008 halbjährlich eine Literaturzeitschrift heraus. Inzwischen ist sie in der jungen zeitgenössischen Poesielandschaft anerkannt. Sie wird oft zu zahlreichen Literatur- und Poesiefachmessen eingeladen und in ganz Frankreich und Europa vertrieben.

En 2012, forte du soutien de nombreux professionnels, poètes et universitaires, elle a décidé de créer sa propre maison d’édition avec la parution d'un premier titre, Piliers, premier recueil de poèmes d'Alena Meas.

Ermutigt durch zahlreiche Fachleute, Dichter und Doktoranten wurde aus A verse ein Verlag. Das erste Buch “Piliers”, der erste Gedichtband von Alena Meas.

Le projet de l'édition de Manèges de Clément Labail est un projet de longue date qui nous tient à cœur. La publication de ce texte met en effet en œuvre l’objectif principal de notre maison d’édition, à savoir soutenir la jeune création et ses auteurs, pour lesquels il est souvent difficile de trouver une concrétisation éditoriale, même avec des manuscrits de qualité. Publier Manèges est donc pour nous un moyen de permettre de faire entendre une des nouvelles voix dramaturgiques du paysage contemporain. Forte de l’expérience de la représentation par l’auteur – également comédien – et sa compagnie, cette pièce trouve aujourd’hui grâce à l’édition un chemin de renouveau servi par un texte pleinement abouti et ainsi la possibilité d’une recréation scénique accompagnée par une diffusion textuelle concrète.

Seit langem ist es uns ein Anliegen, das Stück “Manèges” von Clément Labail zu veröffentlichen. Wichtiger Ansatz bei unserer Arbeit ist,  junge Autoren zu unterstützen und zu fördern. Diese Veröffentlichung gibt uns die Gelegenheit, den neuen dramaturgischen Stimmen einen Platz zu geben. Mit dem Hintergrund der Inszenierung durch das Théâtre Au fil des nuages findet dieses Stück im Zuge der Veröffentlichung eine ausgereifte Form, welche von der Neuinszenierung begleitet wird.

Une autre originalité de cet ouvrage, comme le premier livre paru dans notre maison, est sa présentation bilingue, comportant le texte original en français et sa traduction en allemand. Il nous est en effet apparu que cette pièce était née dans le cœur de la compagnie de théâtre franco-allemande de l’auteur, Au fil des nuages, et que le sens dramaturgique de la pièce ne résidait pas seulement dans son texte original, mais bien aussi dans le bilinguisme des représentations exécutées devant un public souvent franco-allemand. Ainsi, l’édition devant refléter un travail dramaturgique possible, le dialogue entre ces deux langues cousines nous a paru être un élément essentiel de la publication, en particulier dans le contexte européen qui est aujourd’hui le nôtre : les habitants de nos pays, nos marchandises circulent et s’échangent, mais aussi la parole littéraire.

Eine weitere Besonderheit, wie auch beim ersten in unserem Verlag veröffentlichten Buch, ist der zweisprachige Aspekt, mit dem Originaltext auf Französisch und seiner deutschen Übersetzung. Uns scheint es, dass das Erschaffen des Textes von Manèges Kern des vom Autoren mitbegründeten deutsch-französischen Theaters, Au fil des nuages, ist, dass die dramaturgische Bedeutung des Stücks nicht ausschließlich in dem orginellen Text liegt, sondern auch in der Zweisprachigkeit der vor deutschem und französischem Publikum aufgeführten Stücke. Die zweisprachige Edition spiegelt einen möglichen dramaturgischen Weg wieder. Der Dialog zwischen zwei verwandten Sprachen schien uns ein essentieller Bestandteil der Veröffentlichung zu sein, besonders im aktuellen europäischen Kontext:  Menschen reisen von einem Land ins andere, die Waren reisen über Ländergrenzen hinweg, und so auch die Literatur.

Présentation de la pièce

En résumé : Maria et Pierre sont deux clowns, deux forains de second rang. Ils s'occupent d'un manège, font des numéros pour les enfants. Mais elle en a assez. Elle a envie de changer les choses, que ça bouge. Lui, il prend la fuite. Il entend prendre son temps, profiter de la vie, se la couler douce... Alors ils se disputent, et ça chauffe ! Leur prise de bec va trouver une issue insolite dont les spectateurs seront les témoins privilégiés.

Das Stück : Maria und Pierre, privat ein Paar, Kollegen bei der Arbeit, sind zwei Schausteller. Sie betreiben ein Karussell und veranstalten kleine Zirkusnummern für Kinder… Doch Maria hat davon genug. Sie möchte ein neues Leben, mehr Geld zum Reisen und zur Erfüllung Ihrer Träume. Er aber bewegt sich nicht vom Fleck: ein Sandkastenpoet, zufrieden mit seinem Leben; einer, der sich lieber Zeit lässt, das Leben genießt und eine ruhige Kugel schiebt. So kommt es zu einer heftigen Auseinandersetzung. Die Fetzen fliegen… Da sie sich aber lieben und im Grunde dieselben Wünsche teilen, findet der Disput einen ungeahnten Ausgang, dessen priviligierter und tatkräftiger Zeuge das Publikum sein wird.

La pièce, sans subdivisions, se déroule d’un trait, reflet littéraire et dramatique d’une action non divisée, malgré les obstacles entre les deux personnages. Un seul rêve, un voyage, une aspiration humaine.

Et pourtant, les répliques rebondissent, détournent, divaguent, s’envolent et cela donne un effet de tourbillons, de manèges qui s’arrêtent et repartent de plus belle, voire de cercles – d’où la traduction du titre français Manèges en Kreise en allemand – qui tournoient, s’élargissent et s’ouvrent vers d’autres.

Das Stück entwickelt sich ohne Unterbrechungen oder Zeitsprünge und spiegelt somit eine kontinuierliche Handlung wieder. Trotz der Hindernisse, die die beiden Figuren zu überwinden haben, bleibt da ein einziger Traum, eine Reise, ein Wunsch.

Und dennoch, die Dialoge wirbeln, kreisen umeinander, stoßen aneinander, treiben ab. Kreise – so der deutsche Titel Manèges – die sich umeinander drehen, und sich für neue Horizonte öffnen.

Sous-titrée « fantaisie », la pièce met en scène la question de la liberté dans tous ses états. La fantaisie est d’abord thématique : des personnages capricieux, de la famille des fantaisistes de cabaret, qui racontent des histoires en tous genres, dans un vocabulaire fleuri qui ne ménage pas les calembours. Bien vite, le mot de « fantaisie » dérive vers le sens de son cousin allemand d’« imagination ». Les personnages, en effet, rêvent d’un ailleurs, d’un autrement et, par leurs divagations successives, emmènent le spectateur dans un voyage burlesque et poétique où tout est envisageable, où les mots prennent chair pour devenir lien entre des êtres qui se cherchent un rêve commun.

Der Untertitel « Ein Stück Fantasie » zeigt, dass es um die Freiheit in all ihren Zuständen und Ausdrucksweisen geht. Das Fantastische ist zunächst thematisch: etwas eigenwillige Figuren, entschlüpft aus der Welt des Kabaretts, die ganz verschiedene Geschichten in blumiger Sprache erzählen - auch Kalauer kommen nicht zu kurz. Schnell jedoch nimmt das Wort “Fantasie” die Bedeutung seines deutschen Cousins an: “Vorstellungskraft”. Die Figuren träumen von einem “Anderswo”, einem “Anders” und  nehmen die Zuschauer auf eine poetische Reise mit, wo alles möglich ist, wo die Wort einen Körper finden und zur Verbindung zwischen den beiden Figuren werden, die sich suchen, einander und einen gemeinsamen Traum suchen.

L'auteur : Clément Labail a commencé le théâtre autour de Rouen, au lycée des Bruyères, et au Théâtre Maxime Gorki. Il y a joué notamment Dario Fo, Catherine Anne, et a été dirigé par Jacques Kraemer dans Les Cobayes. Il a poursuivi sa formation au Conservatoire de Normandie, dans différents stages, à l’université Paris III-Sorbonne Nouvelle, puis au Théâtre du Lucernaire, avant de créer le Théâtre Au fil des nuages avec Christina Gumz.
Clément Labail écrit principalement pour le théâtre et de la poésie. Ses premiers poèmes ont été publiés par la revue À verse.
Il enseigne également le théâtre aux enfants, aux adultes et aux adolescents.

http://www.clementlabail.com - http://au-fil-des-nuages.net

Clément Labail entdeckte das Schauspiel in der Nähe von Rouen (Frankreich): im Gymnasium Les Bruyères und im Théâtre Maxime Gorki. Dort trat er in Stücken von Dario Fo und Catherine Anne auf und spielte unter der Leitung von Jacques Kraemer in „Les Cobayes”. Es folgte eine Ausbildung am Conservatoire der Normandie, in verschiedenen Workshops, an der Universität Paris 3 – Sorbonne Nouvelle und schließlich im Théâtre du Lucernaire, bevor er mit Christina Gumz das Théâtre Au fil des nuages gründete. Clément ist auch Autor und schreibt vor allem Theaterstücke und Poesie. Die bisher veröffentlichten Texte sind hier aufgelistet. Zudem verfügt er über eine langjährige Erfahrung als Kursleiter für Theater mit Kindern, Jugendlichen und Erwachsenen. 

La traductrice : Christina Gumz a commencé le théâtre en Allemagne, à Schönebeck, où elle a joué Goethe, Kleist, Shakespeare. En France de 2000 à 2007, elle a suivi une formation au Théâtre du Lucernaire à Paris, puis au Conservatoire Charles Munch. Elle est également titulaire d’une maîtrise en Anglais sur le théâtre de Samuel Beckett. Au théâtre, elle a joué plusieurs pièces en particulier au Lucernaire (Les Papotins, Don Quichotte), au festival d’Avignon, et a créé le Théâtre Au fil des nuages en 2005 avec Clément Labail.
Elle a également animé des ateliers de théâtre pour enfants et adultes dans des centres d’animation à Paris.

http://www.christinagumz.com
