story:
A Sustainable Future in Fashion

Less Magazine is a fashion magazine based in Copenhagen and consists of a team of dedicated volunteers, with a sharp focus on sustainability and slow fashion. We put quality, creativity, and handicraft above abundance and trends. We want to inspire our readers to take a stand, be critical and express their personal identity with high-quality garments that are full of thought and care. We focus on the process from creative thought to finished product, the fashion industry itself, and ask the questions that others don’t.

Furthermore, Less Magazine is a platform that aims at providing a voice for young talents within the creative industries be they in the field of design, photography, writing or creative direction. Less is a creative and co-creative platform that brings people together in a collaborative effort to inspire creativity, exploration, and personal expressiveness. The voices of the new talents are contrasted by in-depth academic articles by established scholars in the world of sustainable fashion.

By printing the forthcoming issue it is our wish to add value and increase the longevity of Less Magazine by creating an edition, which can be held as a keepsake, and be kept for reference, inspiration, and decoration. Being in print is adding value to our magazine, one that already revolves around being relevant for a longer period - especially aesthetically. Which is the same idea that slow fashion is concerned with.

 

Our Next Step

We have wanted to bring Less Magazine into print for a long time - but we wanted to do it right. We want to do it without having to compromise on our content, which means staying independent of investors and advertisement, and live up our high standards for sustainability and quality. 

Over the past five years, we have explored themes, developed our content and established a new identity. We are now ready to make the transformation from digital to analogue and launch in a brand-new format. 

It is our mission to print our magazine in the most sustainable way possible, but it is not enough to be sustainable in just the printing process - we want to be cyclical and protect the environment. For this reason, we have partnered with Danish KLS PurePrint, because their printing is 100% sustainable, as well as being Cradle to Cradle certified, meaning their products are completely biodegradable.

With your support, a sustainable and zero-waste production of our 10th issue can be realised, making not only the issue itself sustainable through using eco-friendly ink on sustainable paper, but the way it is produced as well.

 

What We Need & What You Get

By supporting us, you are supporting the awareness of sustainable fashion and sustainable consumption in a time where sustainability and CSR have become branding tools more than a real indicator of social investment. Securing fair wages, choosing deadstock over fresh materials, and producing things locally to ensure the quality and working conditions are things that are now seen as showcasing a sustainable attitude.

Sustainability is so much more than what comes to mind, and we want to shed light on how easy it is for you, and everyone else, to choose sustainably without having to compromise on design, durability, or style. We want to provide you with inspiration, information, and insight so that you can take a stand, and at the same time see how multi-faceted and inspirational sustainability is!

We don't believe in advertisement, we believe in real curiosity and dedication to form the basis of what we are, and what we want to give you as a reader. Supporting our first printed edition you have the opportunity to get limited edition pieces from our collaborators, and a fresh copy of our 10th issue, full of ambition, in-depth articles, exciting interviews, and stunning editorials. 

During the crowdfunding campaign we will be releasing from week to week new exciting perks including different exclusive items. All of the items are eco-friendly produced and created in collaboration with the great designers Stine Linnemann, Barbara I Gongini and Sur le Chemin.

All funds raised will go directly to cover printing costs, production and running costs of Less Magazine, and do not go towards salaries. 

 

 

 

 

 

The campaign runs from the 9th of November to December 23rd. By the end of the campaign, we take stock of all your orders and start printing and producing all items in January 2018. Therefore, please bear with us as we do not want to produce more than what is necessary for the sake of the environment. Depending on your shipping address delivery times will vary, but we’ll make sure you are notified about your specific delivery date. 

 

The Forthcoming Issue 

The upcoming issue will focus on the theme of Symbiosis and features visual as well as written content by a carefully curated selection of contributors.

Visual contributions include photographers like Eivind Hamran from Norway, Pascale Arnaud from France, and Marco Vignati from Italy.

The stunning visuals are curated side by side with exciting articles on topics like the redefinition of luxury, the problems associated with using CSR and sustainability as branding tools, and the symbiosis of design and nature from a designer perspective. Interviews in this issue include talks with menswear label Abasi Rosborough in New York, vegan shoemaker Mats Rombaut and the long-standing Danish designer Jan Machenhauer, offering three contrasting perspectives on slow fashion and sustainable initiatives.

The interview with Jan Machenhauer will be accompanied by an archive shoot showcasing the longevity of his designs, and visually underlines that good style is always on trend. Building into this idea, we are publishing an article on how we as consumers are currently in a process of redefining the concept of luxury, and take a critical look at the current state of affairs in the fashion industry, as well as introducing new and exciting ways of looking at luxury.

The printed issue will feature exclusive material that will only be available in the printed edition, and not online. We will continuously reveal more and more content from the forthcoming issue, and the cover of the magazine will be disclosed in January 2018.

You too can feature in the first printed edition of Less Magazine by contributing €10+ to the campaign!


Other Ways You Can Help

Help us spread the word and the campaign! To reach our goal we need as many people as possible to contribute, and any help you can give us in sharing the campaign would be a great help and very much appreciated!

Our release party will be held during Copenhagen Fashion Week in February, so make sure to stop by and say hi, have a look, and meet our team. 

Thank you all, we really appreciate it!

Sincerely, 

The Less Magazine Team


Campaign cover image by Mathilda Olmi.

We put quality, creativity, and handicraft above abundance and trends. We want to inspire our readers to take a stand, be critical and express their personal identity with high-quality garments that are full of thought and care. We focus on the process from creative thought to finished product, the fashion industry itself, and ask the questions that others don’t.Furthermore, Less Magazine is a platform that aims at providing a voice for young talents within the creative industries be they in the field of design, photography, writing or creative direction. Less is a creative and co-creative platform that brings people together in a collaborative effort to inspire creativity, exploration, and personal expressiveness. The voices of the new talents are contrasted by in-depth academic articles by established scholars in the world of sustainable fashion.By printing the forthcoming issue it is our wish to add value and increase the longevity of Less Magazine by creating an edition, which can be held as a keepsake, and be kept for reference, inspiration, and decoration. Being in print is adding value to our magazine, one that already revolves around being relevant for a longer period - especially aesthetically. Which is the same idea that slow fashion is concerned with. Our Next StepWe have wanted to bring Less Magazine into print for a long time - but we wanted to do it right. We want to do it without having to compromise on our content, which means staying independent of investors and advertisement, and live up our high standards for sustainability and quality. Over the past five years, we have explored themes, developed our content and established a new identity. story:
Overview 

The book is about navigating the healthcare system by understanding its current status and nature, and then harnessing that knowledge to become smarter, better-informed patients and consumers. I wrote it because I want to educate patients and empower them to better understand the different entities that make up their overall health. My book will publish in March 2020.

 

Story of My Book

 

The Healthcare Conversation: Navigating the U.S. Health System is filled with productive discussions and analyses about complicated topics of the healthcare system that have been untouched. This book strives to answer questions that have puzzled everyday Americans for years:

  • “Why is healthcare so expensive in the United States?”
  • “What is the government doing to aid patient consumers?”
  • “How can we advocate for better healthcare?”

 

I have intertwined my own personal struggles with understanding the complex healthcare system with anecdotes and perspectives from real-life professional interviewees to ensure the inclusion of a diversity of people into the healthcare discussion.

My name is Linh Vo and I am the author of The Healthcare Conversation. I wrote this book because I believe that the information regarding the status and nature of our healthcare industry should be understandable and readily available to all Americans.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how to reclaim your purchasing power from the industry and utilize that to make better decisions regarding your health plan. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for self-empowerment and education. And then ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you better navigate/coordinate your own healthcare and become smarter consumers of the system.

In this book, you'll learn about the progression and nature of the healthcare industry, the problems within the system, and the steps needed to succeed as patient consumers. You'll hear real stories from patients and healthcare professional interviewees below:

  • George Chaux, the board-certified medical director of the Lung Transplant Program at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center, explains how to have successful doctor-patient interactions as he attends to his patients’ needs by ensuring that they are comfortable participating in their own healthcare plan.
  • Robert Longyear, the director of product management and delivery at digital health technology company Montuno Software, discusses complex topics such as the methodology of healthcare consumerism, viable solutions on how we can go about fixing healthcare, as well as the controversial ideas of why large for-profit companies are not motivated by greedy incentives.
  • Sharon Donald, the account receivable supervisor at nursing facility Sun Mar Healthcare, accounts the struggle of losing healthcare support from the government for her husband’s terminally illness makes her question American spending on healthcare and whether a universal/single-payer healthcare system may be part of the solution.

 

You will love this book if you are in your twenties and early thirties and are just starting to schedule their own doctor appointments, paying their own bills, or coordinating their own healthcare plan. Although this is my specific target, this book is beneficial for all Americans who want to have their unanswered questions not only answered, but analyzed in a critical light.

The Healthcare Conversation is a non-fiction book that speaks to young American adults who are looking at medical bills and healthcare expenses for the first time.

 

The Book - The Healthcare Conversation: Navigating the U.S. Health System


The book is written in 4 parts....

Part [1] contains the introduction of why I decided to write this book and the mission statement of what I hope we can achieve together through sharing the journey together. It also contains the introductory Chapters 2-5, where readers will learn about the historical progression of healthcare, its qualities compared to other developed countries’ healthcares, and the methodology we will use to approach our care.

Part [2] contains Chapters 6-8. This part talks about the breakdown of healthcare expenses/fees and the country’s total national spending on providing care to its people, while giving insight on the government’s involvement in the system.

Part [3] contains Chapters 9-12. These chapters acknowledge problems of the healthcare system such as the lack of transparency, inconvenience of accessing care, doctor-patient disconnect, and information asymmetry, and then discusses some proposals on how we can change these situations.

Part [4] contains Chapters 13-16, which includes our next steps proceeding forward. This final part is about you, the patients of the American healthcare system and consumers of its industry. It is a call to action for readers to become empowered and change how they manage their own healthcare.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get


This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in February 2020.
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this upcoming Spring.

 

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And many more exciting things...

 

About the Author

 

Linh Vo’s career is focused on pursuing her dream job as a physician at the University of California, Los Angeles. She has experience working as an intern for charity organizations and hospitals, research assistant in psychology labs and stroke prevention projects, and shadowing fellow at hospitals inside and outside the United States.

Through Linh’s work, she hopes to empower and motivate her readers to invest in their own education of the healthcare system. It is her goal to help others embrace their power as smart patient consumers.

If Linh is not at the library, you can find her sipping boba at the nearest milk tea shop or pursuing self-care in the form of doing her nails or falsies.

For more information, you can connect with Linh at linhdoanvo@gmail.com and on Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the supporter, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #TheHealthcareConversation and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book to friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

 

Thank you so much for all of your love and support! Please purchase my book to share the journey with me as I become a published author!

With love and appreciation,
Linh Vo

story:
Story of My Book

Dotted Lines is the story of change and learning how to grow with it. The story traces the journey of an aspiring political journalist as she tries to live alone for the first time in the largest city of India. In the process of tracking the story of Technology and AI, she draws a parallel to changes in the lives of women over the last three generations in the country. I hope to present a narrative about self-discovery and coping with change and challenges, while discussing one of the biggest achievements and problems of this century.

My name is Hrishita Bapuram and I am the author of Dotted Lines. I wrote this book because I believe that the only way to drive change and to make the world a better place is to start talking about it. Only when we converse and deliberate will we ever be able to understand the true gravity of any circumstance. This book is especially relevant in the Indian demographic because the number of working women in India fell from 42.7% in 2004-05 to a staggering 23.3% in 2017-18. This is a serious problem that needs to be understood at a fundamental level and immediately addressed because unequal representation will lead to a vicious cycle of suppression.

My hope is that reading this book will change the way you’ve traditionally viewed social norms, as well as motivate you to set a greater goal for your community and create a plan of action to achieve it.

In this book, you'll encounter multifaceted dimensions of women empowerment, self-discovery, growth and, above all, finding your place in a world that’s constantly changing through narratives like:

  • Navigating living alone for the first time in a city that houses 12.6 million other dreamers.
  • Identifying your greater goal in an empowerment process by simply reflecting on how change has improved your world. Then, figuring out what you can do to drive that change further.
  • Understanding the implication of the increasing dependence on technology on our social constructs and relationships.


FOR ALL:
You will love this book if you feel strongly about ensuring that our world is a much safer, encouraging, and equal space for all of humanity — regardless of gender, race, caste, or creed.

This book is for anyone who wants to learn about the Indian culture - its complicated diversity and undeniable spirit. Its celebration and vibrance, not as a tourist, but in the simplicity and intricacy of the people and their lives.

Ultimately, I hope that Dotted Lines inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

 

  • If we as a society have truly evolved or if we simply put on a façade of a progressive civilization that is still caught up in a dated, tangled mess?
  • If the technology we’re building today is a system evolved enough to understand the complicated nature of human emotions and social constructs?
  • Why are more and more women choosing not to work anymore?

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing women empowerment, change, and self-discovery will change us all for the better.

 

The Book - Dotted Lines

THIS BOOK IS DIVIDED INTO FOUR PARTS:

 book are divided on the basis of the four stages of the empowerment process: Orientation, Confrontation, Differentiation, and Collaboration.

Orientation contains Chapters 1-5. At this stage of the story, the protagonist Neha, is in the process of understanding the sudden changes in the environment and culture around her. She’s still adjusting and learning to adapt to her new life and also to let go of everything very familiar and safe to her.

Confrontation contains chapters 6 - 13. Here, Neha is faced with a series of challenges that will ultimately change the course of the story and by extension, her own opinions, thoughts, and relationships.

Differentiation contains chapters 14-16. This is where Neha’s learning curve sharpens as she tries to make sense of the world she knew collapsing and of the bigger world she is increasingly becoming a part of. This part deals with her dilemma of the long debated question: “To be or not to be?”

Collaboration contains chapter 17-21, which deal with the incidents, decisions, and lessons that ultimately lead to the bigger picture and conclusion of the story.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April, 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Summer (IN)/Spring (USA).

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

About the Author

Hrishita is a sophomore studying Applied Statistics and Analytics in Mumbai, India.

She aspires to become a Data Scientist and hopes to help the world through the power of information and education. Through this book, she aims to start a conversation around a problem long existent in our world at the intersection of one that’s just emerging.

In her free time, you can often find Hrishita curled up with an Agatha Christie novel or baking an unhealthy amount of cookies. She’s the biggest patron of coffee there is and can spend hours talking about it!

For more information, you can connect with Hrishita at author.hbapuram@gmail.com and on her
Website : https://hrishitabapuram.com/
Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/author.hbapuram/
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #DottedLinesbook and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Hrishita Bapuram

She’s still adjusting and learning to adapt to her new life and also to let go of everything very familiar and safe to her.Confrontation contains chapters 6 - 13. Here, Neha is faced with a series of challenges that will ultimately change the course of the story and by extension, her own opinions, thoughts, and relationships.Differentiation contains chapters 14-16. This is where Neha’s learning curve sharpens as she tries to make sense of the world she knew collapsing and of the bigger world she is increasingly becoming a part of. This part deals with her dilemma of the long debated question: “To be or not to be?”Collaboration contains chapter 17-21, which deal with the incidents, decisions, and lessons that ultimately lead to the bigger picture and conclusion of the story. What I Need & What You'll GetThis book will be published with New Degree Press. story:
Story of My Book

The Cave of Appalachia is a story about fear, intrigue, secrecy, and overcoming trauma.


My name is Kyle Curry and I am the author of The Cave of Appalachia. I wrote this book because of spite over the phrase “horror is dead”. Now, spite isn't enough to write a good story, but writing about the two most prevalent issues of today — fear and mental illness — very much is.

My hope for this book is to give insight to those on the outside of mental illness. For those going through it, it is a message that there are people trying to and willing to help you, but you have to let them, but still be attentive of those that want to take advantage of you. To all of you that read this, I want you to learn that fear is a liar.

The Cave of Appalachia details the story of three friends, Kord, and two siblings Clarkson and Theresa, who decide to trespass and explore a forbidden cave in Late August. However, they quickly come to face their decision by a cave-in trapping Kord inside. Unable to rescue their friend, the siblings have to bare the consequence of their actions and seek help. Their help though comes in the form of a Mayor with fiery spirit but little power, a secretive "Mr. Martin" who fights with them every step of the way, and a Lt. Governor who never follows the norm. A race and competition soon forms on four fronts, all to rescue Kord who has now come in contact with another unknown individual in the cave, but a question still remains: Can Kord be rescued before the incoming summer storms, or might he soon succumb to the horrors in the cave?

The Reader (You!)

You will love this book if you like horror, are entertained by mystery, and want to see the inside of an individual’s mind who suffers from mental illness.

The Cave of Appalachia speaks to people dealing with fears, people who are suffering with mental illness and those who personally know the former and are trying to grapple with understanding and providing help for mental illness in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that The Cave of Appalachia inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

  • Do I know someone with mental illness and am I helping?

  • Are we able to control our responses to fear?

  • How might irrational fear and misunderstanding of mental illnesses be damaging our world?

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing irrational fear, mental illness, will change us all for the better.

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2021.

The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Spring.


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.

Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.

You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.

You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.

You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

About the Author

Kyle Curry is a writer of horror and general fiction. He’s also an Eagle Scout, and a senior at Edinboro University, majoring in English and minoring in Cinema and Business Administration.

Curry wishes for his book to speak with the reader on how an individual with mental illness can feel: Alone. Alone with only fear to accompany them in a world that seemingly gets more and more dangerous. He wishes for the reader to walk away with this, as well as enjoying an intense, thrilling story.

In his spare time, Curry likes to watch movies, videos, and shows, read books and graphic novels, listen to music of various genres, research fringe topics he stumbles across — either on accident or on purpose — and shop online for things he’ll never be able to justify buying- such as a $500 toaster...so your basic 21yr old guy. Apart from staying inside, Curry also enjoys gardening, walking through parks, hanging out with friends, and scaring the bear that scares him during the night while taking out the trash.

For more information that doesn’t sound like a dating profile, you can connect with Kyle Curry at kyle.curry.formal@gmail.com and on social media through Twitter: @quackeritz and Instagram: kyle.curry99 .
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #TheCaveofAppalachia and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Kyle Curry

story:
¿Qué?

Aoaris nos muestra un mundo utópico, quizás el soñado, poniendo de manifiesto que en ocasiones no basta con las buenas intenciones y que estamos siempre a un paso de caer víctimas de nuestros propios errores... o de lo peor de nuestra naturaleza.

Desaparecieron las naciones; dejaron de tener sentido. La guerra las convirtió en cenizas, y de esas cenizas emergieron dos mundos antagónicos: Aoaris, o la Civilización del Sol, y Vulperia, un vasto imperio piramidal gobernado en la sombra por una élite corrupta: La Vulpe.

Año 2112. Un sentimiento nuevo, irrefrenable, atrapa al joven Ero Deo y lo arrastra a vivir junto a sus amigos, Milo Ito y Dalae Seo, una aventura que acabará por declinar el futuro de ambas civilizaciones.

Luces y sombras de esta trama de suspense en la que podremos contemplar una sociedad libre de posesiones y prejuicios, donde abundancia y tecnología se dan la mano. Una comunidad que creía haber desterrado de su seno el germen de la crueldad.

Una novela además, Aoaris, que contará con varias ilustraciones del propio autor de las que tenéis arriba (bajo la portada de campaña) varias muestras.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Iván Landa.

Sentado junto a su hermano, Juan Luis. Así recuerda Iván Landa (1972) gran parte de su niñez. Ambos en un escritorio muy largo que su madre compró para que no perdieran la afición por las historietas, esas que imaginaban para convertirlas después en tebeos.

Comenzó así a emborronar papeles a los cinco años y a los dieciocho ya trabajaba ilustrando enciclopedias. Estrictamente autodidacta, apunta a la versatilidad como su gran fuerte. Dedicado a la ilustración educativa, la ha compatibilizado con el mundo del cómic, los cuentos infantiles, las caricaturas, el diseño decorativo, marionetas, etc.  Hoy puede afirmar que veinticinco años no son nada en el mundo del lápiz y el pincel, sin embargo, siente que es hora ya de dar una oportunidad a lo que siempre fue esa otra pasión.

Tras la publicación de su cuento escrito e ilustrado: La llave de Lauviah, se decidió a cumplir el sueño de escribir Aoaris. La primera novela. El último puerto.

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 840€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán para sacar adelante esta primera edición de Aoaris que saldría pocas semanas después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Iván Landa vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

story:
Por qué es importante esta campaña de crowdfunding

En los tiempos que corren, cada vez más, equipos y managers van abandonando prácticas de gestión heredadas de la industrialización y anteponiendo el papel de las personas y equipos. Este libro ayudará a dar ese salto.

La gestión de la creación de software (y de productos intelectuales), por desgracia, ha tenido (y tiene) una altísima influencia de la gestión de la construcción cosas físicas, de la arquitectura, de la industrialización (Taylor, Gantt, etc.) que, por la naturaleza de los anteriores, ha llevado consigo poner a las personas y equipos en un segundo plano.

Como otros libros previos que hemos escrito, el libro tendrá aproximadamente 200 págs. en A5, versión papel, y el equivalente en A4 para la versión pdf.

Este libro pretende resaltar la importancia de los equipos, sintetizando prácticas esenciales para su gestión y se centrará en...

  • Peopleware
  • Management 3.0
  • Gestión ágil (agile management)
  • Equipos de alto rendimiento
  • Experiencias personales y auto-biográficas del autor respecto a los anteriores 

Qué puedes lograr tú en esta campaña

Aparte de ayudar a que sea posible:

  • Formar parte del reducido grupo de personas que han apoyado esta iniciativa, añadiendo tu nombre al libro, como mecenas de este movimiento y como un "peopleware's watcher".
  • Puedes añadir a tu CV que TÚ fuiste mecenas del libro y lo apoyaste explícitamente.
  • También hay opción a que aparezca tu empresa
  • Puedes tener en primicia el libro, antes de que esté disponible a todo el mundo. 

Sobre el financiamento...

Los fondos se destinarán principalmente a:

  • La edición impresa en papel del libro.
  • Vamos a evitar el clásico "tocho texto", para ello queremos invertir todo lo posible en diseño gráfico.
  • Si se logra el objetivo, queremos destinar parte a EDUCO 

Sobre el autor... Javier es pionero de la agilidad en España, su primer proyecto ágil en empresa fue en 2001.

Desde hace 10 años escribe regularmente en su blog, javiergarzas.com, con más de 1700 entradas hasta la fecha. 

Hasta la fecha he ayudado ya a más de 80 empresas.

Actualmente, me dedico a ayudar a las empresas, a que hagan mejor software (en tiempo, con productividad, con calidad, y felicidad). Colaboro activamente con la empresa y comunidad 233 Grados de TI y, además, soy profesor titular de la Universidad Rey Juan Carlos (una de las Universidades de referencia en Madrid).

He sido programador, jefe de proyecto, consultor, director de informática, diseñador, he pasado por casi todas las dedicaciones del desarrollo software.

En lo que refiere a formación, postdoctorado e investigador invitado en la Universidad Carnegie Mellon (Pittsburgh, EE.UU), Doctor (Ph.D.) (cum laude por unanimidad) e Ingeniero Superior en Informática (premio extraordinario) por la UCLM.

Sobre 233 Grados de TI

233 Grados de TI es una comunidad y una organización concienciada en mejorar el mundo de la creación de software y de productos intelectuales. Entre sus actividades previas, 233 ha editado varios libros sobre agilidad, realizado numerosos eventos, ha hecho posible que varios líderes del movimiento ágil vengan a España, colabora regularmente con EDUCO y ha dispuesto multitud de material gratuito para difundir conocimiento (guías, infografías, etc.).

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Si no pueden colaborar... eso no significa que no puedas ayudar:
  • Difunde esta campaña y que genere eco.
  • Estas son nuestras cuentas de Twitter @jgarzas y @233gradosDeTI

Si se logra el objetivo, queremos destinar parte a EDUCO 

Sobre el autor... Javier es pionero de la agilidad en España, su primer proyecto ágil en empresa fue en 2001.
Desde hace 10 años escribe regularmente en su blog, javiergarzas.com, con más de 1700 entradas hasta la fecha. 
Hasta la fecha he ayudado ya a más de 80 empresas.
Actualmente, me dedico a ayudar a las empresas, a que hagan mejor software (en tiempo, con productividad, con calidad, y felicidad). Colaboro activamente con la empresa y comunidad 233 Grados de TI y, además, soy profesor titular de la Universidad Rey Juan Carlos (una de las Universidades de referencia en Madrid).
He sido programador, jefe de proyecto, consultor, director de informática, diseñador, he pasado por casi todas las dedicaciones del desarrollo software.
En lo que refiere a formación, postdoctorado e investigador invitado en la Universidad Carnegie Mellon (Pittsburgh, EE.UU), Doctor (Ph.D.) (cum laude por unanimidad) e Ingeniero Superior en Informática (premio extraordinario) por la UCLM.
Sobre 233 Grados de TI
233 Grados de TI es una comunidad y una organización concienciada en mejorar el mundo de la creación de software y de productos intelectuales. Entre sus actividades previas, 233 ha editado varios libros sobre agilidad, realizado numerosos eventos, ha hecho posible que varios líderes del movimiento ágil vengan a España, colabora regularmente con EDUCO y ha dispuesto multitud de material gratuito para difundir conocimiento (guías, infografías, etc.).
Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Si no pueden colaborar... eso no significa que no puedas ayudar:

Difunde esta campaña y que genere eco.
Estas son nuestras cuentas de Twitter @jgarzas y @233gradosDeTI

story:
My name is Chad Fjerstad. I'm an artist known for my music, video work, and books. In 2014, I self-released my first fictional novel, Popping Cherries, thanks to the aid of a slew of generous supporters and a successful pledge campaign. Now, I've completed my second work of fiction, and would like to open up the opportunity for you all be part of the completion of this once again, as it was such a fulfilling experience the first time around.

By pledging, you are helping to fund a professional edit by seasoned editor Johnny Murdoc, upper tier cover art by acclaimed underground artist Jesse Draxler, interior art by Steak Mtn, and the first pressing of the book. Plus, you have the opportunity to solidify a copy for yourself at the same time.

Every dollar is a great help. If we surpass the goal, the extra funds will be used for marketing and promo to take the book as far as it is capable of going.

Nothing is more fulfilling than a successful collaboration with people who respect and admire one another! I hope that you get just as much out of your pledge as I do when one comes in.

Thank you!

story:
LHOTEL 54, la plus grande maison hantée intérieure ouverte à l'année au Québec et la plus délirante et terrifiante en Amérique du Nord, est bientôt prête à vous effrayer et vous divertir avec la 2e édition de sa maison hantée et de son souper-spectacle à Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu. Tout juste pour la saison de l'Halloween et le temps des Fêtes! Quel épouvantable bonheur!

 

Vous connaissez déjà LHOTEL 54 et vous vous rongez les moignons en attendant qu'elle réouvre enfin ses portes pour de nouveau affronter vos peurs et vous dilater la rate lors d'une soirée rocambolesque et mémorable? Vous venez de découvrir le concept de LHOTEL 54 et voulez l'encourager pour qu'il soit encore plus unique et novateur? Vous êtes des adeptes en quête d'émotions fortes et de productions artistiques et culturelles éclatées et marginales? Vous ne savez jamais quoi offrir à un être cher fan d'horreur et de fantastique?

Participez à notre première campagne de sociofinancement sur Indiegogo afin de nous donner un énorme coup de main afin d'être en mesure de saisir tout le potentiel que représente notre nouvel emplacement, de vous en mettre davantage plein la vue avec notre 2e édition et de faire de LHOTEL 54 une entreprise de divertissement artistique inusitée de qualité, ainsi qu'une attraction touristique incontournable et de renom de la Montérégie, voire du Québec.

Il est rare que les monstres de LHOTEL 54 se montrent si sensibles, mais la cause présente les tiraille au plus profond de leurs entrailles. Nous vous invitons donc à visionner cette capsule vidéo afin de prendre connaissance de notre entreprise, de nos projets de relocalisation et de 2e édition et de notre campagne de sociofinancement sur Indiegogo ainsi qu'à lire le texte qui la suit exposant le tout de façon plus détaillée.

Il est à noter que, bien malgré nous, nous n'avons pas octroyé beaucoup de budget à la réalisation de cette vidéo. Loin de là l'idée de négliger cet aspect, mais notre temps, nos efforts et nos investissements sont prioritairement dédiés à la poursuite de la création du parcours de notre maison hantée ainsi qu'aux tâches et frais nécessaires à la réouverture officielle imminente!
 

QU'EST-CE QUE LHOTEL 54?

LHOTEL 54 est la plus grande maison hantée intérieure ouverte à l'année au Québec et la plus délirante et terrifiante en Amérique du Nord.

Son concept de parcours de corridors hantés interactif ponctué de pièces thématiques terrifiantes où errent des monstres démoniaques et troublés ainsi que de soupers-spectacles inusités et étonnants où performent des artistes professionnels de renommée tels que des comédiens, des magiciens, des illusionnistes, des mentalistes, des fakirs, des artistes burlesques et de cirque, des sideshow/freakshow performers (performeurs d'attractions de curiosités/de phénomènes), des musiciens, des humoristes, des danseurs, et d'autres, promet frissons, surprises, étonnements et rires aux couples, aux familles et aux groupes qui s'y aventurent.

Celui-ci a amusé pas moins de 10 000 visiteurs et spectateurs en 2014 et plus de 35 000 depuis son ouverture en 2009 avec des soirées et des événements divertissants, rocambolesques et mémorables!

Les raisons d'être de LHOTEL 54 sont :

  • de stimuler les sens, de susciter des émotions et d'inspirer l'imagination des gens;

  • de permettre la vie et l'évolution des cultures artistiques du fantastique, de l'épouvante, de l'horreur, du paranormal, des légendes, du carnaval, du sideshow, du freakshow, du burlesque, du vaudeville, du clownesque, du cirque et des univers gravitant autour de ceux-ci, d'en faire la promotion, ainsi que de ses artistes, par différents médiums et médias.

Les missions intrinsèques à ces raisons d'être sont :

  • d'offrir des produits du divertissement, où la qualité, l'unicité, l'originalité, voire la marginalité sont prisées en tant que valeurs ajoutées, aux clients qui désirent vivre une expérience, souligner un événement spécial ou en organiser un;

  • de bonifier l'offre touristique, artistique et culturelle aux visiteurs, excursionnistes et touristes de la région, voire de la province, en divertissant avec ces produits du divertissement;

  • d'agir comme un tremplin pour les artistes de tous genres, disciplines, médiums et médias en mettant à leur disposition un gîte ouvert, respectueux, professionnel, voire amical, soit un lieu de création et une scène évocateurs et inspirants, ainsi qu'une plate-forme rodée et notable de par la popularité et renommée grandissante de LHOTEL 54, où une visibilité et une promotion leur sont disponibles.

UN PROJET DE RELOCALISTION ET DE 2E ÉDITION DE LHOTEL 54?

Motivés par leurs passions et leurs désirs, ainsi que par le succès notable et croissant qu'a connu la 1re édition de l'entreprise durant les dernières 6 années à Sainte-Anne-de-Sabrevois, l'équipe de LHOTEL 54 s'est attaquée à un projet de relocalisation d'envergure ambitieux. 

Déménagée depuis février dernier (2015) dans le centre-ville de Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, dont le positionnement est plus que stratégique et bénéfique autant pour l'entreprise que pour ses visiteurs, les monstres de LHOTEL 54 ont alors élu domicile dans un vieil immeuble plein de potentiel pour leurs aspirations démoniaques, mais dont les installations étaient quelque peu défectueuses ou désuètes.

De nombreux travaux et investissements ont été effectués au niveau de l'urbanisme, de l'architecture, des équipements électriques et sanitaires, de la bureaucratie, … D'innombrables efforts et heures ont été déployés pour obtenir tous les petits bouts de papier pour tous les petits détails administratifs et institutionnels... qui relèvent de la démence d'ailleurs. Mais il faut ce qu'il faut!

Elle a également déjà créé et équipé une grande salle de spectacle et de réception pouvant accueillir des spectacles et des productions de qualité ainsi que 165 personnes assises et 275 debout. LHOTEL 54 aspire à y offrir une copieuse programmation remplie de spectacles, d'événements spéciaux, de festivals, etc.

Les derniers travaux et préparatifs sont en cours et les monstres sont plus que fébriles d'y recevoir de la chair fraîche... euh... des visiteurs et spectateurs!

POURQUOI UNE CAMPAGNE DE SOCIOFINACEMENT?

Les deux fondateurs et partenaires d'affaires de l'enfer, Nancy Sauvé et Jordan Saint-Louis, artistes et entrepreneurs inspirés et inspirants, soutenus par une équipe dévouée composée d'experts et de professionnels en jeu théâtral, en animation et en effets spéciaux, ainsi que de collaborateurs d'expérience motivés, se dévouent déjà et aspirent à faire de LHOTEL 54 une entreprise de divertissement artistique inusitée de qualité, ainsi qu'une attraction touristique incontournable et de renom de la Montérégie, voire du Québec.

Mais comme peu acceptent les paiements en chair, en os ou en âme, LHOTEL 54 fait appel à vous pour la soutenir dans ses projets en regard de ses raisons d'être et de ses missions. 

Chaque don, peu importe la somme, contribue à nous permettre que LHOTEL 54 soit encore plus à la hauteur de sa réputation et des attentes. C'est pourquoi son équipe lance sa première campagne de sociofinancement sur Indiegogo!

QUEL EST L'OBJECTIF DE CETTE CAMPAGNE DE SOCIOFINANCEMENT ET À QUOI SERONT INVESTIS LES FONDS?

L'objectif de notre campagne de sociofinancement EST DE 15 666$ AMASSÉS EN UN MOIS, SOIT 30 JOURS. Celle-ci se terminant le 10 octobre 2015.

Dans l'immédiat, car certaines dépenses considérables sont importantes voire urgentes, car obligatoires et normatives, les fonds amassés seront investis pour :

  • divers travaux de réparation, de rénovation et de réaménagement (escalier extérieur de la sortie secondaire, toit, peinture de la façade, etc.);

  • des matériaux, de la main-d’œuvre et des services professionnels incombant à la continuation de certains de ces travaux;

  • des équipements techniques pour le souper-spectacle (micro-casques).

Dans nos rêves ambitieux les plus fous, pour :

  • une mise en scène peaufinée, de nouveaux artistes, performeurs, comédiens, etc. et de nouveaux numéros;

  • de nouveaux costumes et maquillages, accessoires et décors, sons et musiques, éclairages et ambiances;

  • plus d'intégration de technologie multimédia (conception, réalisation, création) et d'effets spéciaux (animatronique, robotique, projections, etc.), les frais incombant à la conception, la réalisation de ceux-ci et à l'installation des équipements audiovisuels nécessaires;

  • un nouveau spectacle pour les soupers-spectacles: du temps de consultation et de travail, des frais associés à la recherche et développement, à la scénarisation et à la mise en scène pour y intégrer de la médiation artistique, culturelle et historique, des répétitions, etc.

Car bien que LHOTEL 54 poursuive également sa campagne de financement avec les différents acteurs économiques, artistiques, culturels et touristiques de Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, de la Montérégie, du Québec et du Canada, soit sous forme de dons, d'échanges, de subventions, de commandites, de partenariat, de prêts, etc., le sociofinancement représente tout de même une source d'argent considérable et ne peut que permettre d'optimiser le réel potentiel que représente la réouverture à son nouvel emplacement et sa 2e édition.

QUELLES EN SONT LES CONTREPARTIES ET LES CONDITIONS LES RÉGISSANT?

Bien qu'il peut être difficile d'y croire lorsqu'on les rencontre, les monstres de LHOTEL 54 délirent à l'idée de gâter leurs contributeurs. Des contreparties vous sont données en remerciements de vos généreuses contributions : des remerciements par écrit ou par vidéo dédicacée partagés sur Facebook; des invitations pour la soirée privée de réouverture le 1er octobre 2015; de la marchandise promotionnelle de LHOTEL 54 originale et/ou exclusive; des billets pour la visite de la maison hantée et pour notre soirée en formule « visite de la maison hantée suivie du souper-spectacle »; des privilèges lors de ces dernières allant de la soirée VIP, aux traitements particuliers de la part d'un monstre ou à la participation sur scène pour un numéro; des reproductions d'œuvres d'art uniques en édition limitée et exclusive signées par leur créateur et/ou leur personnage ainsi qu'un atelier et un spectacle privés de la part de nos incroyables et délirants artistes de scène, soit notre fakir Gino et notre magicien/mentaliste/illusionniste Steranko. D'autres contreparties inédites vous sont aussi proposées, soit une « invasion » de nos monstres lors d'un événement de votre choix (animation et numéros) ainsi qu'un projet de coup pendable à une personne de votre choix conçu et réalisé par LHOTEL 54.

Afin que vous puissiez visualiser certains éléments de nos contreparties - les photographies des monstres, la casquette, le t-shirt, les reproductions des œuvres (« Yordevil », « Les monstres déménagent » et « Le dernier souper »), le masque de Jason, la pièce de collection - , des images de celles-ci sont disponibles dans l'onglet « Galerie » de la page du présent projet.

En ce qui trait aux dates de livraison, les contreparties vous seront envoyées aux mois indiqués dans le Tableau « Les contreparties et leurs conditions » ci-dessous. C'est l'élément de votre contrepartie dont le mois de livraison prévu sera le plus loin qui tiendra de date de livraison officielle. Dans le cas de contreparties où vous venez nous visiter à LHOTEL 54 avant cette dite date (laissez-passer pour la maison hantée et/ou billet pour la soirée « visite de la maison hantée suivie du souper-spectacle »), vos contreparties pourront vous y être offertes si ces dernières sont disponibles. Il est aussi possible de prendre rendez-vous avec Nancy Sauvé (aux mêmes coordonnées que LHOTEL 54) afin de venir chercher directement votre contrepartie à LHOTEL 54, mais les frais de livraison ne peuvent pas être évités ni remboursés. De plus, vous pouvez offrir et faire livrer les contreparties à une autre personne, suffit encore d'en discuter préalablement avec Nancy Sauvé.

Il est à noter que les descriptions des contreparties ont dû être résumées ou tronquées  en raison d'une limite de 500 caractères imposée par Indiegogo. Cela dit, certaines conditions les régissant n'ont pas pu être incluses dans les descriptions des contreparties, mais sont énumérées et détaillées dans le Tableau « Les contreparties et leurs conditions » qui suit. Ces précisions tiennent lieu de conditions officielles concernant les contreparties en ce qui trait à leur création, à leur livraison, à leur conception et à leur réalisation.

LES CONTREPARTIES ET LEURS CONDITIONS

 EN CONCLUSION...

Si les entrailles vous en démangent, et ce peu importe la raison, n'hésitez pas à communiquer avec Nancy Sauvé de LHOTEL 54, soit au téléphone au (514) 798-9528 ou sans frais au 1 (877) 66-HANTÉ, en courriel à info@lhotel54.com, en message privé par le site officiel ou la page Facebook de LHOTEL 54.

Toute l'équipe de LHOTEL 54 vous remercie d'abord de votre intérêt porté à leur entreprise, à sa réouverture avec sa 2e édition et à cette campagne de sociofinancement sur Indiegogo. Nous vous sommes reconnaissants aussi si le cœur vous en dit de simplement partager ces bonnes nouvelles. Pour se faire, vous êtes invité(e) à utiliser le bouche à oreille, les plates-formes des réseaux sociaux ainsi que les outils de partage d'Indiegogo. Cela ne peut qu'être bénéfique.

Qui plus est, si vous décidez d'investir dans notre entreprise, l'équipe de LHOTEL 54 se retrouve sans mot devant ce geste si généreux. Les monstres n'ont même pas de répliques bien mijotées dans leur folie et leur humour noir à envoyer... Ce qui est assez rare! Mais ils se reprendront assurément lors de votre visite à LHOTEL 54.

un nouveau spectacle pour les soupers-spectacles: du temps de consultation et de travail, des frais associés à la recherche et développement, à la scénarisation et à la mise en scène pour y intégrer de la médiation artistique, culturelle et historique, des répétitions, etc.

Car bien que LHOTEL 54 poursuive également sa campagne de financement avec les différents acteurs économiques, artistiques, culturels et touristiques de Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, de la Montérégie, du Québec et du Canada, soit sous forme de dons, d'échanges, de subventions, de commandites, de partenariat, de prêts, etc., le sociofinancement représente tout de même une source d'argent considérable et ne peut que permettre d'optimiser le réel potentiel que représente la réouverture à son nouvel emplacement et sa 2e édition.

QUELLES EN SONT LES CONTREPARTIES ET LES CONDITIONS LES RÉGISSANT?
Bien qu'il peut être difficile d'y croire lorsqu'on les rencontre, les monstres de LHOTEL 54 délirent à l'idée de gâter leurs contributeurs. Des contreparties vous sont données en remerciements de vos généreuses contributions : des remerciements par écrit ou par vidéo dédicacée partagés sur Facebook; des invitations pour la soirée privée de réouverture le 1er octobre 2015; de la marchandise promotionnelle de LHOTEL 54 originale et/ou exclusive; des billets pour la visite de la maison hantée et pour notre soirée en formule « visite de la maison hantée suivie du souper-spectacle »; des privilèges lors de ces dernières allant de la soirée VIP, aux traitements particuliers de la part d'un monstre ou à la participation sur scène pour un numéro; des reproductions d'œuvres d'art uniques en édition limitée et exclusive signées par leur créateur et/ou leur personnage ainsi qu'un atelier et un spectacle privés de la part de nos incroyables et délirants artistes de scène, soit notre fakir Gino et notre magicien/mentaliste/illusionniste Steranko. D'autres contreparties inédites vous sont aussi proposées, soit une « invasion » de nos monstres lors d'un événement de votre choix (animation et numéros) ainsi qu'un projet de coup pendable à une personne de votre choix conçu et réalisé par LHOTEL 54.
Afin que vous puissiez visualiser certains éléments de nos contreparties - les photographies des monstres, la casquette, le t-shirt, les reproductions des œuvres (« Yordevil », « Les monstres déménagent » et « Le dernier souper »), le masque de Jason, la pièce de collection - , des images de celles-ci sont disponibles dans l'onglet « Galerie » de la page du présent projet.
En ce qui trait aux dates de livraison, les contreparties vous seront envoyées aux mois indiqués dans le Tableau « Les contreparties et leurs conditions » ci-dessous. C'est l'élément de votre contrepartie dont le mois de livraison prévu sera le plus loin qui tiendra de date de livraison officielle. Dans le cas de contreparties où vous venez nous visiter à LHOTEL 54 avant cette dite date (laissez-passer pour la maison hantée et/ou billet pour la soirée « visite de la maison hantée suivie du souper-spectacle »), vos contreparties pourront vous y être offertes si ces dernières sont disponibles. Il est aussi possible de prendre rendez-vous avec Nancy Sauvé (aux mêmes coordonnées que LHOTEL 54) afin de venir chercher directement votre contrepartie à LHOTEL 54, mais les frais de livraison ne peuvent pas être évités ni remboursés. De plus, vous pouvez offrir et faire livrer les contreparties à une autre personne, suffit encore d'en discuter préalablement avec Nancy Sauvé.
Il est à noter que les descriptions des contreparties ont dû être résumées ou tronquées  en raison d'une limite de 500 caractères imposée par Indiegogo. Cela dit, certaines conditions les régissant n'ont pas pu être incluses dans les descriptions des contreparties, mais sont énumérées et détaillées dans le Tableau « Les contreparties et leurs conditions » qui suit. Ces précisions tiennent lieu de conditions officielles concernant les contreparties en ce qui trait à leur création, à leur livraison, à leur conception et à leur réalisation.
LES CONTREPARTIES ET LEURS CONDITIONS


 EN CONCLUSION...

Si les entrailles vous en démangent, et ce peu importe la raison, n'hésitez pas à communiquer avec Nancy Sauvé de LHOTEL 54, soit au téléphone au (514) 798-9528 ou sans frais au 1 (877) 66-HANTÉ, en courriel à info@lhotel54.com, en message privé par le site officiel ou la page Facebook de LHOTEL 54.
Toute l'équipe de LHOTEL 54 vous remercie d'abord de votre intérêt porté à leur entreprise, à sa réouverture avec sa 2e édition et à cette campagne de sociofinancement sur Indiegogo. Nous vous sommes reconnaissants aussi si le cœur vous en dit de simplement partager ces bonnes nouvelles. Pour se faire, vous êtes invité(e) à utiliser le bouche à oreille, les plates-formes des réseaux sociaux ainsi que les outils de partage d'Indiegogo. Cela ne peut qu'être bénéfique.
Qui plus est, si vous décidez d'investir dans notre entreprise, l'équipe de LHOTEL 54 se retrouve sans mot devant ce geste si généreux. Les monstres n'ont même pas de répliques bien mijotées dans leur folie et leur humour noir à envoyer... Ce qui est assez rare! Mais ils se reprendront assurément lors de votre visite à LHOTEL 54.

story:
Greetings all!  I'm Matt Taylor, an award-winning film writer and director, and soon to be, a published children's book author!  Myself, along with my very talented illustrator, Allison Cain, have created a wonderful, new holiday series we are ready to bring to the masses, and we need your help to do it!   We begin with the series protagonist and her story.  It's the story of Carol, the Ancient Yuletide Troll!

A long time ago, there was a troll named Carol. While the other monsters she lived with were mean to human children, she was always nice, and therefore the only monster who would receive presents from Santa for being on the nice list.  This only made the other monsters jealous, and they ignored her, making Carol sad.

One Christmas, Carol visits Santa to ask why the other monsters do not get presents.  She learns they are on the naughty list.  When she tries to warn them they won't receive presents if they continue to be naughty, the monsters ignore her all the more, forcing Carol to take matters into her own hands.  But will her good intentions have dire consequences?  

"Carol, the Ancient Yuletide Troll" is a quirky picture book with a great friendship hook, spare text and will have retro-style illustration!  Its is a fun way to introduce a new Christmas story.  Not only does it teach children the importance of good behavior, it teaches a great lesson in friendship, kindness, and sharing, all that will show the true spirit of Christmas in a new way, and from a not-so-scary monster named Carol.

In order to bring this wonderful new story to the masses, our publishing company needs financial assistance.  Allison and I have a goal to raise $3,000.  Every dollar donated will be one more to getting our book out to communities throughout the nation, reminding all the true meanings of Christmas, and overall bring a family together with a heartwarming story.

We thank you in advance for helping us get our characters and our message out to the masses.  And remember, Santa is watching, and will be sure to keep you on the nice list!  THANK YOU!

story:
Allow Me to Introduce Myself...

Hi, Toni here! I'm very excited to introduce my novella series, The Devil Brigade, to all of you! With your help, this will be my debut novella publication. If you know me, then I tip my hat and say thanks for checking this out! If not, well, here are a few fun facts:

I'm a SUNY New Paltz graduate, holding a BA in Creative Writing. I've had several short stories featured in magazines and anthologies, I'm happy to say! I was a partner on the popular "Otherwise Caffeinated" e-zine for several years, which showcased indie authors of all genres monthly. 

I have been featured on an episode of The Wicked Library, a podcast highlighting indie horror authors, for my short story "Lucky Hands." 

I currently work in television post-production, but daydream in my cubicle about being able to write for my eight hours a day. 






The Novella Series

The Devil Brigade has been a story that has gone through many different identities. It started as a simple short story, worked itself into a massive novel, then broke down into a series. Mostly because of my main character, Ben.

Ben is a young boy who travels the country, carnival to carnival, with the Devil Brigade, a group of sideshow freaks who were compiled by the strange Ringmaster Tom. The year is 1890 and freak shows are of high popularity in the US. Carnival goers rush the stage to see what Ringmaster has on display for them, what oddities will leave them awake at night to ponder. Ben is the most popular freak on display, known to the crowds as Bubonic Boy: Black Death - Alive! Although Ben is always a highlight on display, he starts to worry that this is all life has to give him. He cannot remember how he wound up becoming an oddity or how he even wound up with Ringmaster. He begins to seek answers and comes across dark, strange secrets that could cost him his life...

I don't want to give too much away, but I will say that each novella is a separate entity in Ben's mission to piece together his memories and find out who he really is. 


With your help, I can bring the strange, macabre carnival to life and share it with the world! The debut novella is already written and ready to go with the second one already in the works. I just need the funds for a professional edit, printing, and e-book release!


An excerpt from "The Devil Brigade"

Here are the first few pages of the first novella to give you a sample of my writing. This is the introduction to the whole series, where we first meet Ringmaster Tom and Bubonic Boy, who you will be getting to know much more. 


Chapter 1


Ringmaster stepped out from behind a fringed curtain and twirled his cane between long, crooked fingers. The wooden piece spun fluidly, helicoptering back and forth from thumb to pinky in the dead, humid air. It was Saturday and it was just about time for the first show of the night. His dark, penciled-in eyes seemed to sparkle as he cleared his throat and barked out a deep, booming call.  "Step right up, step right up. Ladies and gentlemen, strangers and friends, why don't you come close and stay for awhile? The Devil Brigade is here!"

His cane’s spinning stopped and the end flipped back behind him as he lowered himself into a long, dramatic bow, arms straight out to his sides and his head down by his hips. When he pulled himself back up, there was not a soul watching. The audience was non-existent, just men and women strolling past his stage, dust rising from the dead country grass from their thick boots.  They all seemed to ignore the sickly green banner slung across the stage from frame to frame: "Freak Show of 1890 - presented by Ringmaster Tom!" The stage was held up with large, swollen wooden poles and filthy curtains that obscured most of the rotted wooden floor. Whether or not they ignored him or just were not interested, the crowd was all the same, filled with men in long shirts and black hats and women with fluffed, short sleeves fanning themselves. They kept their heads turned away from blood red posters splattered with  strange and grotesque bodies posed in awkward positions like melted wax statues. Phrases like "Leave your disbelief at home!" and "Those faint of heart - keep walking!" lined the disturbing images.

Ringmaster removed his oversized black top hat and scratched at frizzy white hair that pointed wildly in all directions.  He rolled the hat back and forth between his fingers in the same motion as his cane, magically spinning the tattered thing like a basketball.  As he spun the hat in deep thought, watching the men and women ignore the stage, he wondered which act would be the best to catch the crowd by surprise, but not climax too quickly.  This town didn’t seem like much of a freak show kinda place - they were hardened, tired people who needed fun and excitement to help them forget their factory jobs and starvings children, not the weird and macabre arts.  For Ringmaster Tom, it was art just to keep the fans engaged, to give the best performance every night without losing stragglers and families pulling away one by one.  It took him years to master his technique and perfect the opening and closings, those moments that were remembered far more than the middle,  and he took great pride in his work. His freaks were some of the best this year and he knew that any one of them would be a decent introduction, but who would be best for last? The Throwaways tonight, his group of freaks he rounded up locally, were a decent bunch, full of grotesqueness that would breathe some strange life into the act.  Maybe he could stage them last, or maybe filter them throughout his traveling show.

He knew that before he could do any of that, he needed to draw some eyes to the stage. What good is a freak show without the gasps and whispers and most importantly, the word of mouth? He stepped loudly and deliberately across the platforms of the stage, each boot step thudding and echoing. The hat continued to roll in his fingers. He needed the perfect catch to call out to, someone charming and engaging to intrigue passing eyes and keep them stopping, one after the other.

As if on cue, a young woman in a frilly white dress stepped up to the side of the stage. Her skirts seemed to bounce heavenly among the lanterns that lit the carnival night. Her face was round and sweet, a lost cherub in this sad town. Her hair was in tight blonde curls that snapped back and forth around her neck and down the front of her lacy, white blouse.  Not a single speck of the park seemed to cling to her and she stood radiantly among the sad, tired faces. She held a wispy mound of fairy floss candy as she stared at the poster on the front of the stage. The image was covered in black, bold question marks and words that asked, "Who is Bubonic Boy?"

Her head cocked to the side and she took a bite of her candy as she read.  Ringmaster stared at her and wondered if his prayers had been answered. She would be perfect for catching eyes.

He stopped pacing and knelt down in front of her, a few feet above her thick blonde curls.  He put his top hat back on his head and pressed his cane into his multicolored coat, addressing her with a respectful bow. "My, my, my! What a beautiful girl! I've been all over the world and have never seen such beauty as yours!"

He smiled a charming smile and realized she, in fact, was abnormally beautiful. Almost like a doll, unrealistically large blue eyes and porcelain skin that radiated under the moonlight. She smiled back at him flirtatiously and giggled to herself.  He was caught off guard by her receptiveness but continued to croon. "Who brought such a lovely young lady here tonight?”

She looked behind herself shyly, then back up to Ringmaster. "Nobody. Just me tonight."

He continued to hold his smile as he removed his cane from inside his coat jacket and on the top of the cane’s knob a small white dove sat, fluttering its wings.  "It's never smart to let a little birdie be by herself...she could fly away!" He shook the cane and the dove startled and flew.

The woman pointed up at the bird and laughed, surprised. "Wow! How did you do that?!"  A few turned their heads and looked at her, then up at the bird she pointed to. They stopped moving and began to listen and watch. Ringmaster’s voice got a little louder.

"I've learned many things in my travels, my dear. Will you be so kind as to stay awhile and see what else I have discovered?"  

“Sure! I would love to. Something tells me this will be a fun show.”

A few others began to stand in front of the stage and with one stopped person, another

stopped and soon the gathering began. They murmured and pointed at the signs and posters curiously, the hum of the crowd rising.  Ringmaster waited until he counted fifty or sixty heads. He was in disbelief of how quickly she brought in a crowd. If I could only have a type like her at every show, I’d be doing the best business of my life.

He adjusted his top hat, pulled at the lapels of his jacket, cleared his throat, and opened his mouth to address his waiting audience.

* * *

Inside a dirty covered wagon sat a boy of no more than sixteen years old.  He was among dishes, colorful props, boxes of costumes and makeup, and lots of other clutter. In his corner where he sat, he picked up a broken hand mirror and stared into it as he took a deep breath. He glared at the reflected fragments of himself, stretched this way and that, spotted and grotesque. He sighed and tried to think of what day it was. The crowd he heard Ringmaster conjuring suggested the business of a Saturday, but sometimes Friday could be busy too. He couldn’t remember if they did shows last night and that depressed him. The days seemed to all blur together at this point after doing so many for as long as he had. His knees were sore and beginning to bruise, so he assumed he probably did some kind of stunt yesterday. It must be Saturday.

He knew it didn’t make a difference. No matter the day or week or year, he would always do four shows a night. One show every hour. He would only be on stage for two minutes, sometimes three if the crowd loved him. Those minutes felt like hours though, especially because he didn’t have a choice. There were no sick days and no time off - he had to do what Ringmaster told him to and that was that.

The wagon he sat in was huge, large enough to carry the props and workers, yet it still always felt so cluttered and claustrophobic.  At the moment it was empty  as the others were already behind the stage, ready for the first show of the night. They had pushed and nudged him to come along and wait with them, but he wasn’t in the mood yet.  His costume was simple and easy anyway - he could just grab everything and get up there a few minutes just before he went on. He stopped caring if he was late because realistically he knew it it would only be more suspense for the audience to wait for him to get up there.. At least that was always his excuse with Ringmaster whenever it was brought into question and the whip was drawn.

The boy put down the mirror and glanced over at the flyer for the carnival. He  wanted to read it from where it sat, but the candle light was too dim to make out any of the small print. All he could see was the large, printed letters that said:

BUBONIC BOY: BLACK DEATH - ALIVE!

The letters were bold and black, standing out amongst the other images and phrases plastered across the paper. He knew underneath the title was a drawing of what he supposedly looked like. The drawing was horrific - a spotted creature with gigantic red eyes, a mouth curled in a snarl with rotted teeth and fangs exposed. Although he knew he didn’t look like that, he couldn’t help but feel there was some reality to it all. If he saw that creature wandering the streets, he would gasp and point just like the crowd gasped and pointed at him. He knew he could hold up the flyer to the candle to get a good look at it for the millionth time, but he asked himself what purpose it would serve except to make him more depressed.

Candles were the only source of light in the wagon, unless Ringmaster was feeling generous and would let them pull the cover of the wagon off a bit for some sunlight and air. He tended not to allow this though for fear of others seeing the freaks outside of the show and starting terrible rumors. The boy wasn’t exactly sure what could possibly be said that already hadn’t been, but he took Ringmaster’s word for it. He’d be doing this show forever, for much longer since  he’d been around, so he must know what’s best.

The boy could feel the hot, dusty air blowing through the holes in the wagon’s canopy  and he smelled sugary candy that probably tasted delicious.  He wasn't sure how it tasted because he never had it, but the smell was always the same at every carnival and it always smelled nice and refreshing.


-The Devil Brigade by Toni Odell. Copyright 2013.




What is Need & What You Get

I'm not here to make lots of money - I just want to share a story that I think will be enjoyed! I won't ask for thousands of dollars because I don't need it for this project (although, if you really want to throw fistfuls of hundreds at me, don't hesitate). I'm asking for my absolute minimum so I can release a professional piece of fiction while keeping it accessible to audiences.  I intend on selling my ebook and paperback for very costs and spreading the good word about the Brigade!!

Here are some of the perks I am offering if you are so generous as to help me fund this series:


$5 - You have my eternal gratitude! I will send a postcard featuring the debut novella cover (designed by the talented Marissa Letterio) expressing my thanks! You also get a PDF copy of the first novella that you can read on your kindle, nook, or computer.



$20 - You receive a postcard and a signed paperback copy of the debut novella! 


$40 - You get the postcard, PDF, signed paperback copy of the debut novella, and a PDF of the second novella (the date is TBD, but expect it within six months. I will stay in contact about this!)


$50 - Now we're getting serious, kids. I'll send along the postcard, PDF, signed paperback copy of the debut novella, a PDF of the second novella (TBD), and the promo poster signed!


$60 - Wow! Not only do I love ya lots, but I will give you the postcard, PDF of both the debut novella and the second (TBD), a signed paperback copy of the debut novella, a signed poster, and I will write you in as a character somewhere in the series (we can discuss this at your leisure).


$80 - You really like me! Jeez. Postcard, PDFs of the debut novella and second novella (TBD), a signed paperback copy of the debut novella, signed poster, I'll write you into the series (we can discuss this at your leisure), and a special thank you as a fundraiser in the Thank You section of each released novella.


$100 - You're too kind. Seriously. Not only do you get all of the previously mentioned perks (postcard, PDFs of the two novellas, signed paperback, signed cover poster, written into the series as per your suggestion, and a special thank you), I will send you a signed paperback version of each novella as they are released (please remember that these are TBD, but trust me. If you donate $100 or over, I won't forget about ya!)


PLEASE NOTE: I can only fund this if my entire goal is met. If the goal is not met, the money is not donated and the perks are not released. But we can do this!


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, I completely understand! I do ask though that you help me spread the word about this campaign.

If you have friends who are into horror fiction or the strange and macabre, I simply ask that you share this along! Anything you do to help is forever appreciated. Thanks so much, guys!
